1112001.name: Crush Ring
1112001.desc: When purchased, enter the name of the character you're being a couple with, then the item works for both. When the two are together, an effect comes out. Also, it can only be that of one male and one female character.

1112002.name: Cloud Ring
1112002.desc: After purchasing the ring, enter the name of the character that'll become your partner, so the other character will also receive the ring. Once the two characters equip themselves with the ring, stand next to each other to trigger the special effect. The couple-ring can only be worn by a couple that consists of two characters that are of opposite sex.

1112003.name: Cupid Ring

1112006.name: Crossed Hearts

When purchased, enter the name of the character you're being a couple with, then the item works for both. When the two are together, an effect comes out. Also, it can only be that of one male and one female character.

1112008.name: Angel Bunny Promise Ring

Stand next to each other with the both items equipped to trigger a special effect. The couple must be composed of one male and one female character for the effect to work. Designed by the China MapleStory player changyeyi.

1812002.name: Auto HP Potion Pouch
1812002.desc: Pet will automatically consume potions by setting the HP alert in system option. \n#c Place the pouch in Pet Ability section at Pet Equip window in Equip window as well as the potion for Pet to consume in Pet HP section#

1812003.desc: Pet will automatically consume potions by setting the MP alert in system option. \n#c Place the pouch in Pet Ability section at Pet Equip window in Equip window as well as the potion for Pet to consume in Pet MP section#

1812004.name: Wing Boots
1812004.desc: With these boots, your pet will move to mesos/items dropped by monsters to collect them. Applies only to your monster spoils if not equiped with Magic Scales. Applies only with combination of which items you are equiped with. (Meso Magnet, Item Pouch)

1812005.name: Binocular
1812005.desc: With this Binocular AND Wing Boots, your pet will move to mesos/items dropped by monsters to collect them in a #cwider range than solely equipping Wing Boots.#

1812006.name: Magic Scales
1812006.desc: With these scales, your pet will become knowledgable of ownership expiration of dropped mesos/items from monsters and will also pick them up. Applies only with combination of which items you are equiped with. (Meso Magnet, Item Pouch)

1812007.name: Item Ignore Pendant
1812007.desc: This allows the pet to be selective in picking up dropped items by avoiding selected items. Once the owner has learned the Trainer's Command, the Lead Pet needs to have the skill in order for it to be activated.\n#cAvailable to a pet that can pick up mesos and items.#

1812008.name: Auto Buff Gem
1812008.desc: This gem gives your pet the ability to automatically cast buff skills onto its owner. Place your desired skill in the open slot next to the Auto Buff Gem in the pet's Equipment Inventory. You no longer have to worry about casting your favorite buff, your pet will do it for you!

1812009.name: Auto All Cure Potion Pouch
1812009.desc: Pet will automatically consume an All Cure Potion when the character is at an abnormal state. Drag and drop the pouch and the All Cure Potion stack to designated slot in the pet equip window.

2022195.desc: Refreshing drink for thirsty travelers! Recovers 80% HP, 90% MP and gives a boost of +2 Att for 30 mins.

2022196.name: Wedding Bouquet
2022196.desc: A special wedding bouquet.  Gives +5 Weapon Attack and +3 Magic Attack for 5 minutes.

2022197.name: Wedding Bouquet
2022197.desc: A special wedding bouquet.  Gives +8 Weapon Attack and +5 Magic Attack for 5 minutes.

2022198.name: Russellon's Pills
2022198.desc: A pill made by Russellon from Magatia.  The actual effects of this pill remain a mystery...

2022199.name: Russellon's Potion
2022199.desc: A potion made by Russellon from Magatia. The actual effects of this potion remain a mystery...

2022200.name: Wedding Bouquet
2022200.desc: A special wedding bouquet.  Gives +10 Weapon Attack and +8 Magic Attack for 5 minutes.

2022203.name: Laksa
2022203.desc: Singapore local speciality spicy noodle. It triggers one to sweat after consumpsion.\nRecovers 800 HP.

2022204.name: Hokkien Mee
2022204.desc: Singapore's local speciality prawn noodles. It is normally served with prawns, chili & lime. \nRecovers 1200 HP.

2022205.name: Carrot Cake
2022205.desc: A delicious local traditional food. It is made up of carrot extracts & secret recipes. \nRecovers 1800 HP.

2022206.name: Chicken Rice
2022206.desc: A delicious Singapore local traditional food. The rice is covered with the fragrant secret recipes of chicken extracts.\nRecovers 2200 HP.

2022207.name: Satay
2022207.desc: A delicious Singapore local traditional BBQ food. It is normally served with curry sauces. Its fragrance can be sensed a distance away.\nRecovers 2600 HP.

2022208.name: Guava
2022208.desc: A fruit that is hard & sour. Its nutritional value improves our digestive system.\nRecovers 500 MP.

2022209.name: Rambutan
2022209.desc: A fruit that is delicious & juicy. It is so sweet that it attracts ants if they are not well attended to. \nRecovers 800 MP

2022210.name: Dragon Fruit
2022210.desc: Another fruit that is delicious & juicy, similar to Rambutan, it will attract unwanted pests if they are not attended. \nRecovers 1600 MP.

2022211.name: Durian
2022211.desc: The fruit is nominated as the King of Fruits around the region. Despite having a hard & thorny shell, the fruit that lies within is extremely fragrant, and it tastes great! \nRecovers 3200 MP.

2022212.name: Nasi Lemak
2022212.desc: A popular Malay Traditional Dish mainly made up of rice, egg & cucumber, soaked with pandan fragrant.\nImproves Magic Attack +8 for 5 minutes.

2022213.name: Roti Prata
2022213.desc: A popular Indian Traditional Dish made up of flour. It is normally served with sugar & curry sauces. \nImproves Magic Attack +8 for 10 Minutes.

2022214.name: Pepper Crab
2022214.desc: A popular Chinese traditional dish made of up fresh steam crab, pepper, egg & secret recipes.\nImproves Weapon Attack +8 for 5 minutes.

2022215.name: Chili Crab
2022215.desc: A popular Chinese traditional dish made of up fresh steam crab, chili power, egg & secret recipes.\nImproves Weapon Attack +8 for 10 minutes.

2022224.name: Russellon's Potion
2022224.desc: A potion made by Russellon from Magatia. The actual effects of this potion remain a mystery...

2022225.name: Russellon's Potion
2022225.desc: A potion made by Russellon from Magatia. The actual effects of this potion remain a mystery...

2022226.name: Russellon's Potion
2022226.desc: A potion made by Russellon from Magatia. The actual effects of this potion remain a mystery...

2022227.name: Russellon's Potion
2022227.desc: A potion made by Russellon from Magatia. The actual effects of this potion remain a mystery...

2022228.name: Russellon's Potion
2022228.desc: A potion made by Russellon from Magatia. The actual effects of this potion remain a mystery...

2022231.name: Regular Tomato Juice
2022231.desc: Pure tomato juice made out of the new tomatoes of this year. \nRecovers 200 HP and MP.

2022232.name: Orange Mushroom flavoured Tomato Juice
2022232.desc: A tomato juice mixed with the orange mushroom caps. \nSpeed +15 for 15 min.

2022233.name: Leaf flavoured Tomato Juice
2022233.desc: A tomato juice mixed with the leaves. \nWeapon Attack +25 for 15 min.

2022234.name: Slime Bubble flavoured Tomato Juice
2022234.desc: A tomato juice mixed with the slime bubbles. \nDefense +40 for 15 min.

2022235.name: Huge Bubble flavoured Tomato Juice
2022235.desc: A tomato juice mixed with the huge bubbles. \nMagic Attack +25 for 15 min.

2022236.name: Super Tomato Juice
2022236.desc: A mysterious tomato juice which have some special power. Weapon & Magic Attack +10, Defense +50, Accuracy & Avoidability +25, Speed & Jump +5 for 15 min.

2022238.name: MesoGears Ring
2022238.desc: An ancient ring of wondrous power. There appears to be a faded inscription along the side..."Subani". Provides a boost of +8 W. Att, +15 M. Att, +12 Def/M. Def. for 8 minutes.

2022239.name: Cassandra's Magic
2022239.desc: A special magic spell cast by Cassandra. For 30 minutes, Attack +10, Magic Attack +10, DEF +30, Accuracy +20, Avoidability +20, Speed +7, and Jump +5.

2022240.name: Cassandra's Magic
2022240.desc: A special magic spell cast by Cassandra. For 1 hour, Attack +10, Magic Attack +10, DEF +30, Accuracy +20, Avoidability +20, Speed +7, and Jump +5.

2022241.name: Full Mug of Non-Alcoholic Beer
2022241.desc: A mug filled with cold beer. 100% free of alcohol. \nRecovers 7000 HP and MP.

2022242.name: Edmund's Special Brew
2022242.desc: A healing tonic made with Edmund's secret recipe.  Just the thing when you're feeling under the weather!  [Restores 50% of HP and MP, also gives +14 W. Att + 30 M.Att, for 10 minutes.]

2022243.name: Sophilia's Necklace
2022243.desc: A jewel crafted by Prendergast for his daughter, intended as a protective gift for her 16th birthday.

2022244.name: Smore
2022244.desc: A tasty, hot smore. Perfect for a toasty Halloween night!

2022245.name: Heartstopper
2022245.desc: Just one taste of this spicy candy and it'll feel like your heart's on fire! [Gives +60 Weapon Attack, +60 Speed, +60 Avoidability for 1 minute]

2022246.name: Pumpkin Taffy
2022246.desc: Sweetened pumpkin taffy on a candy cane stick.  [Gives +15 Weapon Defense, +15 Magic Defense for 5 minutes]

2022247.name: Red Gummy Slime
2022247.desc: Super-chewy gummy slimes. This one is cherry-flavored.  If only real Slimes tasted this good. [Restore 1200HP, 1200MP]

2022248.name: Green Gummy Slime
2022248.desc: Super-chewy gummy slimes. This one is lime-flavored.  If only real Slimes tasted this good. [Restores 600 HP]

2022249.name: Purple Gummy Slime
2022249.desc: Super-chewy gummy slimes. This one is grape-flavored.  If only real Slimes tasted this good. [Restores 600 MP]

2022250.name: Orange Gummy Slime
2022250.desc: Super-chewy gummy slimes. This one is orange-flavored.  If only real Slimes tasted this good. [Restores 600HP, 600MP]

2022251.name: Maple Pop
2022251.desc: A mouth-watering, delectable sweet treat! [Gives +100 Accuracy for 1 minute]

2022252.name: Tae Roon's Note
2022252.desc: A small note written by Tae Roon. This note is enchanted, so it boosts weapon attack and magic attack by 3 for 1 minute.

2022253.name: Mushroom Candy
2022253.desc: Delicious mushroom candy from Sen. This candy makes anyone feel good about themselves. So good, that it boosts Jump +3 for 3 minutes.

2022254.name: Mug of Non-Alcoholic Beer
2022254.desc: A cold beer which is completely free of alcohol. \nRecovers 5000 HP and MP.

2022255.name: Pumpkin Pieces
2022255.desc: Pieces of pumpkin left over from making halloween Jack-o'-Lanterns. The pumpkin, perfectly ripe, has an aroma that is sweeter than ever. Each piece recovers 50 HP and 50 MP.

2022256.name: Halloween Candy
2022256.desc: A candy wrapped in stripes. Kids love it. Recovers 20 HP and MP.

2022257.name: Power of the Glowing Rock
2022257.desc: Received a mysterious power from the Glowing Rock. Boosts the weapon attack and magic attack slightly for 10 minutes.

2022258.name: Coconut Juice
2022258.desc: A small hole is up on the top of the Coconut, where the straw goes in. Drink the juice with the straw for maximum refreshment. Recovers 100 HP.

2022259.name: Attack Crystal
2022259.desc: A red crystal with a mysterious power packed in. Attack +5 for 5 minutes.

2022260.name: Accuracy Crystal
2022260.desc: A blue crystal with a mysterious power packed in. Accuracy +5 for 5 minutes.

2022261.name: Stuffing Scoop
2022261.desc: A delicious scoop of stuffing. This treat comes around only once in a while so eat it up before it gets cold. \n[Restores 600 HP/ 600 MP]

2022262.name: Cranberry Sauce
2022262.desc: This delicious cranberry sauce complements almost any meal! \n[Gives + 30 Magic Attack for 3 minutes]

2022263.name: Mashed Potato
2022263.desc: It looks like someone dropped this potato. \n[Restores 800 HP]

2022264.name: Gravy
2022264.desc: The only thing better than a gravy boat is a gravy train. \n[Restores 800 MP]

2022265.name: Snowing Fishbread
2022265.desc: Increases Physical Attack Power by 20 and Magic Attack Power by 30 for 15 minutes.

2022266.name: Power Punch
2022266.desc: A fist used during the Hunting Tournament. Boosts weapon and magic attack.

2022267.name: Wing of the Wind
2022267.desc: A set of wings used during the Hunting Tournament. Boosts speed and jump.

2022268.name: Crazy Skull
2022268.desc: An eyeball-rotating skull used during the Hunting Tournament. Inverts directions.

2022269.name: Shield
2022269.desc: A shield used during the Hunting Tournament. Protects the owner from the bomb once.

2022271.name: Maplemas Ham
2022271.desc: A delicious looking Christmas Ham with a sprig of mistletoe on top.\nRecovers 3000 HP and MP.

2022272.name: Smoken Salmon
2022272.desc: The traditional Versalmas dinner.  Smells... like fish. \nRecovers 2385 HP and 3791 MP.

2022273.name: Ssiws Cheese
2022273.desc: Cheese from the alternate dimension of Versal.  Looks funny but smells quite nice.  \nGives +220 Magic Attack for 2 minutes

2022274.name: Sugar-Coated Olives
2022274.desc: Olives frosted with pink sugar -- a special treat beloved by children from Versal! \nGives +40 Speed and + 25 Jump for 5 minutes.

2022275.name: Caramel Onion
2022275.desc: O-Pongo's favorite treat!  Creamy caramel with a crunchy onion center! \nRestores 800 HP and MP.

2022276.name: Chocolate Wafers
2022276.desc: A crispy wafer layered with chocolate creme. \nGives +40 Weapon Attack for 3 minutes

2022277.name: Sunblock
2022277.desc: SPF 1000.  Blocks all harmful rays, including magical ones. \nGives +200 Magic Defense for 10 minutes.

2022279.name: Snow Cake Piece
2022279.desc: A piece of cake that consists of snow-white whipped cream and cherry. Recovers 300 HP and MP.

2022280.name: A Flurry of Snow
2022280.desc: Increases Physical Attack Power by 20 and Magic Attack Power by 30 for 15 minutes.

2022281.name: Chinese Firecrackers
2022281.desc: A string of Chinese firecrackers known to scare away ghoulish spirits.

2022282.name: Naricain's Demon Elixir
2022282.desc: A fiery black liquid that gives the user the power of a thousand demons when consumed. [Gives +140 Weapon Attack for 8 minutes]

2022283.name: Subani's Mystic Cauldron
2022283.desc: Drinking the swirling blue liquid within this small iron pot fills the user with an energy that emanates a protective aura. [Gives +100 Weapon Defense, +200 Magic Attack for 10 minutes]

2022284.name: Barricade Booster
2022284.desc: John Barricade's special concoction, used to get him out of tight jams.  For use in emergencies!  [Gives +50 Avoidability, +50 Accuracy, +10 Jump for 5 minutes]

2022285.name: Sweet Heart
2022285.desc: Weapon attack +20, Magic attack +30 for 15 minutes.

2022296.name: Power Scream
2022296.desc: A power scream from Maple Admin. Weapon attack +8, Magic attack +12 for 30 minutes.

2022302.name: Party Bear
2022302.desc: Weapon attack +20, Magic attack +30 for 15 minutes.

2022305.name: Taru Face Paint
2022305.desc: This mystical camouflage allows the user to blend into his or her surroundings. [Gives +100 Avoidability for 5 minutes.]

2022306.name: Primal Brew
2022306.desc: A mixture made from an ancient Taru shaman recipe. Instills warriors with the primal strength of the Jungle Spirit. [Gives +35 Weapon Attack, +10 Accuracy for 20 minutes.]

2022307.name: Spirit Herbs
2022307.desc: Special incense used by ancient Taru shamans for communion rituals with the Jungle Spirit. [Gives +90 Magic Attack for 20 minutes.]

2022308.name: Jungle Juice
2022308.desc: A delicious natural beverage made from a secret blend of jungle fruits, flowers, roots, and vines. The perfect thing to fuel a Taru brave through a long jungle trek!  [Restores 1000 HP and 2000 MP.]

2022309.name: Treasure Hunt Note
2022309.desc: Spread all over the Maple World for the 4th anniversary of MapleStory, this note contains the prizes that you'll win when this is found.

2022310.name: Chocolate Cream Cupcake
2022310.desc: A delicious chocolate cupcake with vanilla cream filling. One taste and you'll be hooked!  [Restores 300 HP & MP, and gives +30 Accuracy, +30 Speed, and +30 Jump for 3 minutes.]

2022311.name: Big Cream Puff
2022311.desc: A rare, tasty dessert. Known as the 'Warrior's Dessert' to some and the 'Fattening Treat' to others. [Gives +30 Weapon Attack for 3 minutes.]

2022323.name: Fish Net with a Catch
2022323.desc: The fish net seems to have caught something. Let's double-click it to check its content.

2022324.name: Big Belly Fish
2022324.desc: A fish that apparently swallowed something. Let's double-click on the fish to check its content.

2022326.name: Blessing of the Forest
2022326.desc: With the purified forest raining gold rain, all affected will receive a temporary boost on speed and jump.

2022332.name: Agent O's Encouragement
2022332.desc: An encouraging message from Agent O.  Jump rate will be increased by 20 for 30 minutes.

2022333.name: Agent O's Encouragement
2022333.desc: An encouraging message from Agent O.  Speed will be increased by 40 for 30 minutes.

2022335.name: Baby Chick Cookie
2022335.desc: This is a cookie shaped like a baby chick. Recovers 1000 HP and MP.

2022337.name: Sorcerer's Potion
2022337.desc: This is a potion that you can buy from Sorcerer. It's potent, but its side-effects are equally strong. It's also very expensive, so be careful with it.

2022338.name: VitroJuice
2022338.desc: A futuristic power pack full of liquid fuel synthesized by T-1337.  Looks suspiciously like an energy drink.  Drink at your own risk! [Gives +14 Weapon Attack for 15 minutes]

2022339.name: NitroJuice
2022339.desc: A futuristic power pack full of liquid fuel synthesized by T-1337.  Looks suspiciously like an energy drink.  Drink at your own risk! [Gives +22 Weapon Attack for 10 minutes]

2022340.name: BlastroJuice
2022340.desc: A futuristic power pack full of liquid fuel synthesized by T-1337.  Looks suspiciously like an energy drink.  Drink at your own risk! [Gives +90 Weapon Attack for 1 minute]

2022341.name: ElectroJuice
2022341.desc: A futuristic power pack full of liquid fuel synthesized by T-1337.  Looks suspiciously like an energy drink, but drink at your own risk! [Gives +50 Magic Attack for 10 minutes.]

2022342.name: MegaJuice
2022342.desc: A futuristic power pack full of liquid fuel synthesized by T-1337.  Looks suspiciously like an energy drink, but drink at your own risk! [Gives +200 Magic Attack for 30 seconds.]

2022343.name: GigaJuice
2022343.desc: A futuristic power pack full of liquid fuel synthesized by T-1337.  Tasty and strong enough to dissolve rust from machinery!  Drink at your own risk! [Gives +700 Magic Attack for 10 seconds.]

2022344.name: JigaJuice
2022344.desc: A futuristic power pack full of liquid fuel synthesized by T-1337.  Drink at your own risk!   Gives the user a sudden jolting surge of energy, so use it or lose it! [Gives +1000 Magic Attack for 5 seconds.]

2022345.name: The Energizer Drink
2022345.desc: An energizing drink packed with electrolytes. For 30 minutes, you will receive a boost of: Attack +25, Magic Attack +30, Defense +30

2022352.name: Fire Grill Skewer
2022352.desc: A delicious holiday food made out of beef, mushroom, and bellflower on a skewer.

2022354.name: Tick-Tock's Egg
2022354.desc: This is Tick-Tock's egg. There must be something inside.

2022355.name: Cronos' Egg
2022355.desc: This is Cronos' egg. There must be something inside.

2022356.name: Sweet Rice Cake
2022356.desc: A sweet, tasty rice cake. Recovers 1,500 HP and MP.

2022357.name: Sweet Rice Cake
2022357.desc: A sweet, tasty rice cake. ATT +8, MP +8 for 15 minutes.

2022358.name: Sweet Rice Cake
2022358.desc: A sweet, tasty rice cake. For 15 min., Speed +5, Jump +3.

2022422.name: Small Stories
2022422.desc: A tape that contains various small stories from daily life. You can fine view its content by double-clicking on it.

2022423.name: Gaga's Appreciation
2022423.desc: Gaga's appreciation. For an hour, your attack and magic rate will go up 20, defense rate 100, accuracy and avoidability 50, and speed and jump ability will go up 10.

2022424.name: Gaga's Appreciation
2022424.desc: Gaga's appreciation. For 20 minutes, your attack rate and magic will go up 10, defense rate 30, accuracy and avoidability 20, and speed and jump ability will go up 3.

2022428.name: Mysterious Box
2022428.desc: A box with something mysterious inside. I should open it to see what it could be. If it's my lucky day, I might find an awesome gift inside.n#cYou can open it by double-clicking on it.#

2022429.name: Protective Shield
2022429.desc: It can only be used in Mu Lung Dojo. It blocks an attack up to 3 times.

2022431.name: Mu Lung Dojo Elixir
2022431.desc: It recovers 50% of your HP and MP.

2022432.name: Mu Lung Dojo Power Elixir
2022432.desc: It recovers both HP and MP.

2022434.name: Warm and Fuzzy Winter
2022434.desc: Weapon Att +20, Magic Att +30 for 15 minutes.

2022436.name: Holiday Buff
2022436.desc: A Holiday present from the Snow Spirit. For 15 min., Speed +5.

2022437.name: Holiday Buff
2022437.desc: A Holiday present from the Snow Spirit. For 15 min., Jump +7.

2022438.name: Holiday Buff
2022438.desc: A Holiday present from the Snow Spirit. For 15 min., Speed and Jump +10.

2022439.name: Elixir of Darkness
2022439.desc: A mysterious concoction of herbs brewed deep within the mountains of El Nath. [Gives +200 Magic Attack, -25 Defense for 5 minutes.]

2022440.name: Gold Dust
2022440.desc: Ancient dust found long ago by the miners in El Nath. [Gives +20 Defense for 5 minutes.]

2022441.name: Adonis Cauldron
2022441.desc: A rather clumsy attempt at potion creation by Adonis. Still useful in the hands of a skilled warrior. [Gives +40 Weapon Attack, +50 Avoidability, -30 Defense for 10 minutes.]

2022442.name: Maze Reward
2022442.desc: The EXP awarded by completing the maze created by Richie Gold.

2022443.name: Fireworks
2022443.desc: The fireworks for celebrating MV's defeat. Speed +5, Physical & Magic Attack +5 for 20 min.

2022444.name: Mihile's Blessing
2022444.desc: Once I used the 'Torn Cygnus' Book', a mysterious power covered me and blessed me.

2022445.name: Oz's Blessing
2022445.desc: Once I used the 'Torn Cygnus' Book', a mysterious power covered me and blessed me.

2022446.name: Irena's Blessing
2022446.desc: Once I used the 'Torn Cygnus' Book', a mysterious power covered me and blessed me.

2022447.name: Eckhart's Blessing
2022447.desc: Once I used the 'Torn Cygnus' Book', a mysterious power covered me and blessed me.

2022448.name: Hawkeye's Blessing
2022448.desc: Once I used the 'Torn Cygnus' Book', a mysterious power covered me and blessed me.

2022449.name: Pink Bean Squad : Victory
2022449.desc: Weapon Attack +35, Magic Attack +45, Weapon Defense +250, Magic Defense +250 for one hour.

2022454.name: Cygnus's Blessing
2022454.desc: Once I completed Cygnus' Book, the spirit's power covered me and blessed me.  It increased my Attack Rate by 10, Physical Defense Rate by 80 and  Speed by 5 for 10 minutes.

2022455.name: Happy New Year!
2022455.desc: Weapon Att +20, Magic Att +30 for 15 min.

2022456.name: Elixir

2022457.name: Power Elixir

2022458.name: Shinsoo's Blessing
2022458.desc: For 1 hour, Weapon Att +5, MP +10, Weapon DEF +20, Magic DEF +20, Speed +10.

2022465.desc: A box in which no one has a clue what's in it. If the luck in is your side, then a beautiful present might be in store.n#cDouble-click to open.#

2022476.desc: A popular Malaysian dish. This mild curry contains chicken pieces with rich coconut milk, onions and spices. \nRecovers 4000 HP.

2022477.name: Mee Siam
2022477.desc: A popular Malaysian dish made up of thin rice noodles. Served with salted soy beans, dried bean curd, boiled egg and tamarind. \nRecovers 4000 MP.

2022478.desc: This famous dish is served with generous amounts of sweet thick, spicy peanut sauce with bean curds, prawn fritters, hard-boiled eggs and bean sprouts.\nRecovers 1000 HP and 1000 MP.

2022479.desc: This spicy vegetable dish is served with KanKung (water spinach) and spicy sambal.nImproves Weapon Attack and Magic Attack +8 for 10 minutes.

2022480.desc: These sweet, bite-sized delights are a favorite pastry dish served during parties and just for tea.\nImproves Speed +10 for 30 minutes.

2022526.name: Azalea
2022526.desc: A spring flower that especially enjoys sunlight. Restores approximately 2000 HP.

2022527.name: Forsythia
2022527.desc: The first flower to bloom in the spring. Restores approximately 2000 HP.

2022528.name: Clover
2022528.desc: A spring flower that symbolizes good luck. Restores approximately 2000 HP.

2022529.name: Meaning of Azaleas
2022529.desc: The meaning of Azaleas is love. 2x Meso drops for 30 minutes.

2022530.name: Meaning of Forsythias
2022530.desc: The meaning of Forsythias is hope. 2X item drops for 30 minutes.

2022531.name: Meaning of Clovers
2022531.desc: The meaning of Clovers in luck.  2X item drops for 1 hour.

2022536.name: Underground Temple's Seal
2022536.desc: The Seal's energy has been placed on the Underground Temple in order to trap the Balrog inside. It restricts the abilites of all living things.

2022537.name: Gladius' Strength
2022537.desc: The abilites of the person wieldng the Hero's Gladius is amplified under the protection of Tristan. Weapon ATT +30 and Magic ATT +30.

2022538.name: Red Easter Egg
2022538.desc: A freshly boiled egg colored in red. Recovers 400 HP and MP.

2022539.name: Cry of a Little Lamb
2022539.desc: Wolves slow down when they hear a lamb cry.

2022541.name: Self Protection
2022541.desc: Protects from a Wolf's attack 1 time.

2022542.name: Little Lamb's Surprise Attack
2022542.desc: Attacks a Wolf's back, temporarily immobolizing it.

2022543.name: Great Confusion
2022543.desc: Causes the sheep to become confused and lose direction.

2022544.name: White Elixir
2022544.desc: A legendary potion. \nRecovers 50% HP and MP and cancels abnormal statuses. It can recover all abnormal statuses.

2022545.name: Dynamite Drink EX
2022545.desc: A drink with "Energy Boost" written on the label. Consuming this drink will grant ATT +25, MP +30, DEF +30, and Jump +10 for 30 minutes.

2022546.name: Energy Drink
2022546.desc: Consuming this drink will increase MAX HP for a set amount of time.

2022548.name: Sound of the Wolf's Bells
2022548.desc: Sheep are temporarily unable to move.

2022549.name: Wolf's Threat
2022549.desc: Intimidates the sheep, making them weaker.

2022550.name: Sheep Ranch Golden ? Egg
2022550.desc: A golden egg that can only be obtained at the Sheep Ranch. It has a question mark engraved on it. Double-click to find out what's inside.

2022552.name: 7th Anniversary Gift Box
2022552.desc: A gift box celebrating Maple Story's 7th Anniversary. What could be inside? \n#cCan be opened by double-clicking.#

2022553.name: Crackers's Buff
2022553.desc: A buff that Crackers has placed on the Witch's Treasure. Weapon and Magic Attack +10, Defense +20, Accuracy +20, and Avoidability +20 for 40 minutes.

2022554.name: Independence Day Firecracker 1
2022554.desc: This firecracker has been specially made to celebrate July 4th, 1776, our Independence Day. For 10 minutes, Speed and Jump increase by 5.

2022555.name: Independence Day Firecracker 2
2022555.desc: This firecracker has been specially made to celebrate July 4th, 1776, our Independence Day. For 10 minutes, Attack and Magic increase by 5.

2022556.name: Independence Day Firecracker 3
2022556.desc: This firecracker has been specially made to celebrate July 4th, 1776, our Independence Day. For 10 minutes, Def. and Magic Def. increase by 10.

2022562.name: Artifact Hunt Encouragement Buff
2022562.desc: A buff to encourage you upon accumulating 2,500 points in the Artifact Hunt. Attack +3, Magic Attack +6, Speed +6

2022563.name: Artifact Hunt Encouragement Buff
2022563.desc: A buff to encourage you upon accumulating 4,000 points in the Artifact Hunt. Attack +5, Magic Attack +10, Speed +15

2022564.desc: A paper box containing a special present commemorating the Aran release. It is well-packed, so you may need to #cdouble-click# to open.

2022613.name: Pharaoh's Treasure Chest
2022613.desc: A treasure chest containing Pharaoh's treasured items. Double-click to open.

2022614.name: Bingo Gift Box
2022614.desc: A surprise gift box received after completing a line on the Bingo Board. Open it to discover what's inside!

2022615.name: Subway Lost and Found
2022615.desc: A Lost and Found box accidentally ingested by Bubbling. Double-click to open.

2022618.name: Pharaoh's Treasure Chest
2022618.desc: A treasure chest containing Pharaoh's precious items. Double-click to open.

2022620.name: Handmade Sandwich
2022620.desc: A sandwich made personally by Anna. Eat it in the morning to guarantee a sense of satisfaction all throughout the day.

2022621.name: Tasty Milk
2022621.desc: Fresh milk produced at the farm. \nRecovers around 100 HP.

2022622.name: Squeezed Juice
2022622.desc: Fresh juice produced at the farm. \nRecovers around 50 MP.

2022623.name: Seasoned Frog Eggs and Mushrooms
2022623.desc: A stinky dish made with Cursed Frog Eggs. Increases 400 HP if eaten.

2022624.name: Bloody Mushroom Wine
2022624.desc: A non-alcoholic wine made by the Witch using Cursed Cat Spittle. Increases 200 MP when consumed.

2022625.name: Slimy Canape
2022625.desc: A creepy and slimy Canape that the Witch has made for you. Increases Weapon ATT and Weapon DEF +15 for 15 minutes.

2022626.name: Zingy Kabab
2022626.desc: A suspiciously sharp-tasting Kabab that the Witch has made for you.  Increases Magic ATT And Magic DEF +15 for 15 minutes.

2022627.name: Swamp Wrap
2022627.desc: The Witch's wrap dish that fills your mouth with the aroma of the swamp with each bite. Increases Weapon ATT and Weapon DEF +25 for 15 minutes.

2022628.name: Rough Leather Steak
2022628.desc: A rough leather steak that the Witch has carefully grilled for you. Increases Magic ATT And Magic Defense +25 for 15 minutes.

2022629.name: Witch's Special Stew
2022629.desc: The Witch's special stew that gives off a sour stink. Increases Weapon and Magic ATT +40, Weapons and Magic DEF +100, and Speed and Jump +15 for 15 minutes.

2022631.name: Rose Scent
2022631.desc: As you are surrounded by the fragrant scent of Roses, you get a strange headache and your feet start to feel heavy. Go see Lana before the scent disappears.

2022632.name: Freesia Scent
2022632.desc: As you are surrounded by the refreshing scent of Freesias, you get a strange headache and your feet start to feel heavy. Go see Lana before the scent disappears.

2022633.name: Lavender Scent
2022633.desc: As you are surrounded by the sweet scent of Lavenders, you get a strange headache and your feet start to feel heavy. Go see Lana before the scent disappears.

2022634.name: Turkey Leg
2022634.desc: A huge roasted turkey leg. It's so big that it seems like it would take all day to finish eating.\n[Gives +30 Physical Attack for 3 minutes]

2022635.name: Enchanted Peppermint
2022635.desc: The mysterious striped candy cane glows with a magical light. When consumed, it gives: +35 W.Att, +10 Jump for 20 minutes.

2022636.name: Spellbound Lollipop
2022636.desc: This sugary treat emanates a dim light.\r\nWhen consumed, it gives: +45 M.Att, +10 Speed for 20 minutes.

2022701.name: Speed Up
2022701.desc: #cAn item for Ad Balloon Hunts#\r\nIncreases the Attack Speed and Movement Speed of you and your party members for 15 sec.

2022702.name: Speed Down
2022702.desc: #cAn item for Ad Balloon Hunts#\r\nDecreases the Attack Speed and Movement Speed of the opposing party members for 15 sec.

2022703.name: Bomb Attack
2022703.desc: #cAn item for Ad Balloon Hunts#\r\nInstalls and activates a Time Bomb in the hunting field. Affected opponents will be stunned for 3 sec.

2023137.name: Ginger Man Cookie
2023137.desc: This spicy, sweet Ginger Man Cookie was made with Earl Grey tea. \nRecovers about 3,000 HP.

2023138.name: Ginger Lady Cookie
2023138.desc: This spicy, sweet Ginger Lady Cookie was made with Earl Grey tea. \nRecovers about 3,000 MP.

2023139.name: Tomanha's Potion of Speed
2023139.desc: A rare, powerful potion brewed according to ancient recipes. When consumed, gives +40 Speed, +20 Jump for 10 minutes.

2023140.name: Bubble Gum
2023140.desc: A fruity, chewy stick of gum. Sure to add a spring to your step! Gives +10 Jump and +90 Avoidability for 5 minutes.

2023141.name: Bubble Tea
2023141.desc: A refreshing cup of tea, with plenty of chewy pearls. Gives +60 Magic Attack for 5 minutes.

2023142.name: Chocolate Popsicle
2023142.desc: A chocolate popsicle... a chocsicle? Gives +40 Weapon Attack for 5 minutes.

2023143.name: Coconut Drink
2023143.desc: A creamy, fruity drink served in a coconut. Perfect for a hot summer day! Recovers 7000 HP.

2023144.name: Hydration Flask
2023144.desc: A bottle of cool, fresh spring water. Stay hydrated! Recovers 5000 HP and 5000 MP.

2023145.name: Royal Cola
2023145.desc: An ice-cold can of fizzy cola. Gives +20 Speed and +50 Accuracy for 5 minutes.

2023146.name: Slimecream Cone
2023146.desc: A freaky icecream cone that looks like a slime. Recovers 7000 MP.

2029000.name: Blessing of the Moon Goddess
2029000.desc: Chang'e, Goddess of the Moon, has blessed all Maplers with her divine powers! [Gives +5% Weapon Attack, +5% Magic Attack, for 1 hour.]

2029001.name: Auf Haven Squad : Victory
2029001.desc: Weapon Attack +30, Magic Attack +40, Weapon Defense +200, Magic Defense +200 for one hour.

2029002.name: Von Leon Squad : Victory
2029002.desc: Weapon Attack +40, Magic Attack +60, Weapon Defense +250, Magic Defense +250 for one hour.

2029005.name: A Flurry of Powerful Snow
2029005.desc: Increases Physical Attack Power by 100 and Magic Attack Power by 100 for 2 minutes.

2030000.name: Return Scroll - Nearest Town
2030000.desc: Returns you to the nearest town.

2030005.name: Return Scroll to Kerning City
2030005.desc: Returns you to the dark Kerning City.

2030006.name: Return Scroll to Sleepywood
2030006.desc: Returns you to Sleepywood, a quiet and dark forest-town.

2030007.name: Return Scroll for Dead Mine
2030007.desc: Returns you to the dead mine at the higher ground of El Nath.\nCan only be used in Orbis and El Nath.

2030008.name: Coffee Milk
2030008.desc: Returns you to the nearest town.

2030011.name: Command Center Warp Capsule
2030011.desc: A warp capsule that allows the owner of the capsule to warp to the Command Center of Omega Sector.

2030012.name: Ludibrium Warp Capsule
2030012.desc: A warp capsule that returns you to Ludibrium.

2030016.name: Phyllia's Warp Powder
2030016.desc: Warp powder made by fairy Phyllia.  Teleports you to Magatia when used inside the Nihal desert region.

2030019.name: Nautilus Return Scroll
2030019.desc: This scroll enables you to return to the Pirate village, Nautilus. This is a one use item and will disappear after use.

2030020.name: Return to New Leaf City Scroll
2030020.desc: Use this scroll to venture back to New Leaf City whenever you want!

2030021.name: The Knight's Magic Scroll
2030021.desc: A scroll that the Lion King gave to his knights. When used, you will move to the Audience Room Coridoor of the Lion King.

2031000.name: Masked Man's Invitation
2031000.desc: An invitation from the Masked Man to the Halloween Party at the Haunted Mansion. Double-click to move straight to the mansion.

2031001.name: Studio Invitation
2031001.desc: An invitation to the studio for the event "For Guild Only".

2031002.name: Invitation to the Moon
2031002.desc: An invitation to the moon, sent by the Moon Bunnies. Using this will send you directly to Moon Bunny's ????.

2031003.name: Invitation to the Nest
2031003.desc: An invitation to the baby bird's nest sent by Gaga. Use it to be sent directly to the nest.

2031004.name: Invitation to Ereve
2031004.desc: An invitation to Ereve from Neinheart. This invitation will allow you to instantly move to Ereve.

2031006.name: Family Studio Photo Coupon
2031006.desc: A coupon that allows you to attend the 6th Anniversary Family Photo Shoot Event.

2031008.name: Rien Teleport Ticket
2031008.desc: A teleport ticket given by the Maple Admin. It will immediately teleport you to Rien.

2032000.name: Richie Gold's Strange Lamp
2032000.desc: An unbelievable lamp made by Richie Gold. Use this, and you'll be led somewhere in in the maze. No one knows exactly where you'll be sent, though.

2070024.name: Royal Throwing-Knives

2190000.name: Lie Detector Test
2190000.desc: Can be used on suspected botters. Usable only when a suspect is hunting.

2210000.name: Orange Mushroom Piece
2210000.desc: A crystal piece that resembles Orange Mushroom. When used, the crystal will melt into the body, and its mythical power will transform the user into Orange Mushroom. This mythical power will last for an hour.

2210001.name: Ribbon Pig Piece
2210001.desc: A crystal piece that resembles Ribbon Pig. When used, the crystal will melt into the body, and its mythical power will transform the user into Ribbon Pig. This mythical power will last for an hour.

2210002.name: Grey Piece
2210002.desc: A crystal piece that resembles Grey. When used, the crystal will melt into the body, and its mythical power will transform the user into Grey. This mythical power will last for an hour.

2210004.name: Blue Ribbon Pig Piece

2210006.name: Rainbow-colored Snail Shell

2210007.name: Change to Ghost
2210007.desc: First the body feels light, then all of a sudden, you're floating. Oh no, you're a ghost!

2210008.name: Ghost Candy
2210008.desc: A ghost-shaped candy with a mysterious set of ingredients. Apparently it has some special powers.

2210009.name: Sophillia's Abandoned Doll
2210009.desc: An abandoned doll that Sophillia threw away a long time ago, but revived by the Masked Man. Pet its hair, and you'll turn into Sophillia for 3 minutes.

2210010.name: Potion of Transformation
2210010.desc: The moment this potion is taken, you'll become a powerful, otherworldly being.

2210011.name: Potion of Transformation
2210011.desc: The moment this potion is taken, you'll become a powerful, otherworldly being.

2210012.name: Change to Mouse
2210012.desc: Transform into a small, tiny mouse.

2210016.name: Mini Draco Transformation
2210016.desc: The mysterious skills of an old halfling has transformed you into a form of a dragon. You can now fly.

2210017.name: Moon Photo
2210017.desc: The more you look at it, the more you feel lightheaded… and you feel closer to the moon.

2210018.name: Sweet Rice Cake
2210018.desc: A sweet, delicious rice cake. Sometimes creates an interesting set of powers.

2210021.name: Gaga Transformation Potion
2210021.desc: The moment you drink this potion, you'll become the biggest star in the world of Maple, Gaga.

2210022.name: Peto Transformation Potion
2210022.desc: A transformation potion from the masked gentleman that allows you to transform into Peto for 15 minutes.

2210023.name: Cliff's Special Potion
2210023.desc: No one knows what you'll transform into when you drink this, but something WILL happen for one hour.  It's all about the risk...

2210024.name: Maplemas Party Potion
2210024.desc: Double-click on this to transform a character of your choice. Which one? Try it and find out!

2210032.name: Cody's Picture
2210032.desc: A picture given by Cody of himself.  I get a feeling something fun will happen when I use it.

2210033.name: Cake Picture
2210033.desc: A picture of a delicious cake that Gaga gave as a gift. I get a feeling something funny will happen when I use it.

2210034.name: Alien Gray Transformation
2210034.desc: The mysterious force emanating from the crystal statue shall be absorbed into your body, and you will no longer find yourself as you are.

2210035.name: Penguin Transformation 1
2210035.desc: Will transform you into a penguin.

2210036.name: Penguin Transformation 2
2210036.desc: Will transform you into a penguin.

2210037.desc: Will transform you into a penguin.

2210038.desc: Will transform you into a penguin.

2210039.name: Penguin Transformation 5
2210039.desc: Will transform you into a penguin.

2210999.name: CCTV Transformation

2270001.name: Pouch
2270001.desc: A pouch with a jewel on the surface. Possesses a special power in that double-clicking the pouch will suck up the surrounding ghosts in the area.

2270002.name: Element Rock
2270002.desc: A special alchemist tool that converts an absorbed power of monster into a jewel. The inner part seems to be slightly transparent.

2270003.name: Cliff's Magic Cane
2270003.desc: A magic cane that tames the lost Rudolph.

2270004.name: Purification Marble
2270004.desc: It's a special magic marble that can contain and purify a monster.

2270005.name: 1st Transparent Marble
2270005.desc: A special magic marble that can contain a poisoned monster on the 1st floor.

2270006.name: 2nd Transparent Marble
2270006.desc: A special magic marble that can contain a poisoned monster on the 2nd floor.

2270007.name: 3rd Transparent Marble
2270007.desc: A special magic marble that can contain a poisoned monster on the 3rd floor.

2270008.name: Fish Net
2270008.desc: A fish net intended to catch something. Can be used with Gaga.

2270009.name: Red Ribbon Pig
2270009.desc: A red ribbon that helps catch Maze Pig.

2270010.name: Green Ribbon Pig
2270010.desc: A green ribbon that helps catch Maze Pig.

2270011.name: Blue Ribbon Pig
2270011.desc: A blue ribbon that helps catch Maze Pig.

2270012.name: Purple Ribbon Pig
2270012.desc: A purple ribbon that helps catch Maze Pig.

2280000.name: Lava Bottle
2280000.desc: A glass bottle that contains an actual lava, which is waiting to be spilled out. Drink this lava, and the lava will consume the body with fire, which will enable the drinker to master Fire Demon.

2280001.name: Black Cloud Machine
2280001.desc: A mechanical device that produces black clouds. Enables the character to acquire the Smokescreen skill using the clouds.

2280002.name: Firm Hand
2280002.desc: A stimulant packaged inside a bottle that resembles a clenched fist. Drinking the stimulant will allow the character to acquire The Will of a Warrior.

2280003.name: [Skill Book] Maple Warrior
2280003.desc: You can learn #cMaple Warrior# with this book.\nJob : All 4th jobs\nCondition : #cMaple Warrior# not acquired.

2280004.name: [Skill Book] Infinity

2310000.desc: #cThe Owl of Minerva#, which represents wisdom, can be used to search for items sold at the Free Market. #cDisappears right after showing the results of the item search#.

2320000.name: Teleport Rock
2320000.desc: Remembers 5 maps of your choice. This rock will enable you to #cteleport to the map you remembered#. It can even allow you to #cmove to the map where a certain character is#, provided that the person is in the same channel at the same world.

2340000.desc: One of Subani's sacred Scrolls. If used in conjunction with a normal or Dark Scroll, the number of item upgrade slots will not be deducted if the scroll fails. However, if using a Dark Scroll, there is still a chance that your weapon will be destroyed.

2360000.name: Change to Ghost

2360001.name: Ghost Candy
2360001.desc: A ghost-shaped candy with a mysterious set of ingredients. Take this to change into a ghost for 1 hour.

2390000.name: Helena's Marble
2390000.desc: A marble given by Helena. Use this to communicate with her regardless of the place. This item is good for one-time use only...

2430000.name: Torn Cygnus' Book Volume 1
2430000.desc: When used one at a time, a special power covers my body and blesses me.  I think if I collect 20, I'll be able to read what's written inside.

2430001.name: Torn Cygnus' Book Volume 2
2430001.desc: When used one at a time, a special power covers my body and blesses me.  I think if I collect 20, I'll be able to read what's written inside.

2430002.name: Torn Cygnus' Book Volume 3
2430002.desc: When used one at a time, a special power covers my body and blesses me.  I think if I collect 20, I'll be able to read what's written inside.

2430003.name: Cygnus Quiz
2430003.desc: I can receive a reward by answering questions regarding the Cygnus Knights.  I should click on it and try.

2430004.name: Richie Gold's Random Key Pot
2430004.desc: Resets the Gold Key Room in Richie Gold's Maze.

2430005.name: Memorial Map
2430005.desc: Allows you to check your current position, along with the spot of the Gold Key Room.

2430006.name: Mysterious Piece of Paper
2430006.desc: It's full of mysterious scribbles. n#cA quest will begin when you double-click it.#

2430007.name: Empty Compass
2430007.desc: A compass with no markings.  However, it can be turned into a working compass if you have the letters #cN,E,W,S#.

2430008.name: Golden Compass
2430008.desc: A golden compass that reveals the location of Gold Richie's Treasure Island. \n#cBy double-clicking it# you can move to the island.

2430009.name: Pure Perfume
2430009.desc: A perfume that contains the scent of an inexperienced adventurer. n#cBy double-clicking on it#, that scent is released to confuse monsters.

2430010.name: Mysterious Artifact
2430010.desc: An artifact with an unknown date of origin.\n#cDouble-click# on it to find out its date of origin.

2430013.name: Peng Peng Popsicle
2430013.desc: A frozen popsicle that tranforms you into a Peng Peng. There's no determining the type of Peng Peng you'll transform into.

2430014.name: Killer Mushroom Spore
2430014.desc: A powerful chemical extracted from a Poison Mushroom. Helps you remove sprawling, thorny magic barriers in the forest.

2430015.name: Thorn Remover
2430015.desc: A magic powder that eliminates the thorns from sprawling vines.

2430016.name: Cooler Box
2430016.desc: An ice cold cooler box filled with items that will help you stay cool in the summer. The contents will melt if you don't open it during the event period.

2430017.name: New Year's Present
2430017.desc: A New Year's present the Maple Admin lost while delivering it.  Open it to see what's inside.

2430026.name: Mystery Box
2430026.desc: A box whose contents are unknown, though a Yellow Butterfly might just be hidden inside. It will be empty if opened by a character higher than Lv. 41.

2430027.name: Mystery Box
2430027.desc: A box whose contents are unknown, though a Yellow Butterfly might just be hidden inside. It will be empty if opened by a character higher than Lv. 71.

2430028.name: Mystery Box
2430028.desc: A box whose contents are unknown, though a Yellow Butterfly might just be hidden inside. It will be empty if opened by a character higher than Lv. 101.

2430029.name: Mystery Box
2430029.desc: A box whose contents are unknown, though a Yellow Butterfly might just be hidden inside.

2430030.name: Golden Compass
2430030.desc: A golden compass that will lead you to Goldrich's Treasure Island. \n#cDouble-click it to# be transported to the Treasure Island.

2430031.name: Instant Camera
2430031.desc: An instant camera that can be used to take a picture of the moon. To take a picture of the moon, double-click on the moon that can be seen from town. If you fail to capture the picture, return to the Moon Bunny for another instant camera.

2430032.name: Black Bag
2430032.desc: A black bag you received from Hiver, a member of the Black Wings. Release it in front of the Safe...

2430094.name: Charge +1
2430094.desc: #cAn item for Balloon Hunts#\r\n\Charges your team's vertical jump gauge by 1.

2430095.name: Gauge Up
2430095.desc: #cAn item for Balloon Hunts#\r\n\Increases the leading team's gauge by a fixed amount.

2430159.name: Alcaster's Crystal
2430159.desc: A crystal containing Alcaster's magic. Use it to lift the Lion King's curse from the villagers.

2430943.name: Ice Chest
2430943.desc: An ice chest full of goodies to help you stay cool in the summer time. The contents will melt if you don't open it up before the event ends.

2430950.name: Magic Treasure Map
2430950.desc: An old, damaged treasure map made of thick parchment paper. It shows a picture of the Maple World. One location is marked with an "X".

2431694.name: 9th Anniversary Mystery Box
2431694.desc: A special mystery gift box made just for 9th anniversary. #cDouble-Click# to open.

2439000.name: Halloween Gauntlet Invitation
2439000.desc: An invitation to the Halloween Gauntlet. Use this item to warp to the Halloween Gauntlet Lobby.

2439001.name: 7 Year Anniversary Gift Box
2439001.desc: Double-click to receive a 7 Year Anniversary gift.

2439002.name: 7 Year Anniversary Weapon Box
2439002.desc: Double-click to receive a Lv. 35 Maple Anniversary weapon.

2439003.name: 7 Year Anniversary Weapon Box
2439003.desc: Double-click to receive a Lv. 43 Maple Anniversary weapon.

2439004.name: 7 Year Anniversary Weapon Box
2439004.desc: Double-click to receive a Lv. 64 Maple Anniversary weapon.

2439005.name: 7 Year Anniversary Weapon Box
2439005.desc: Double-click to receive a Lv. 77 Maple Anniversary weapon.

2439006.name: Golden Easter Egg
2439006.desc: An easter egg that an Eggy Pop stole, return it to the Mad Bunny!

2439007.name: Maple Tree PQ Gift Box
2439007.desc: A crate containing unknown treasures. Double-click to open!

2439008.name: GM Event Warp
2439008.desc: Warp all players on current map to specific GM event maps.

2439009.name: GM Event Dice
2439009.desc: Broadcast a random number to the map.

2439010.name: GM Event Jukebox
2439010.desc: Broadcast a song to the map.

2439011.name: Christmas Present
2439011.desc: Double-click to receive a gift from the Christmas Present box!

2440000.name: Richie Gold's Fake Lead
2440000.desc: Using this will randomly take you to a spot in the maze.

4000333.name: Telescope

4000334.name: Empty Sack

4000335.name: Kiyo's Beek

4000339.name: Jonin Throwing Star

4000346.name: Emperor Toad Wallet

4000350.name: Wooden Hammer

4000361.name: May Mist

4000382.name: Blue Essence

4000383.name: Red Essence

4000506.desc: A horn from Gold Yeti, one of the head security members of King Pepe.

4000510.desc: The Bluejay Feather that the Wise One from the Miwok tribe used to predict the future. Kopee Relicseeker says she can make the legendary ring using the feather.

4000511.desc: The Red Bird Feather that the Wise One from the Miwok tribe used to predict the future. Kopee Relicseeker says she can make the legendary ring using the feather.

4000513.desc: The buffalo horn with which the Brave One from the Miwok tribe equipped himself in battles. Kopee Relicseeker says she can make the legendary ring using the horn.

4000514.name: Puma Bones of the Brave One
4000514.desc: The puma bone with which the Brave One from the Miwok tribe equipped himself in battles. Kopee Relicseeker says she can make the legendary ring using the puma bones.

4000518.name: Haunted Mansion Gold Key

4000519.desc: A key that looks like it can unlock the doors inside the Haunted Mansion.

4000520.name: Haunted Mansion Brass Key
4000520.desc: A key that looks like it can unlock the doors inside the Haunted Mansion.

4000523.desc: Cat saliva that has been cursed with Black Magic. Also, it is used as an ingredient in Witch Malady's cooking.

4000524.desc: Looks like a type of currency used in a world other than Maple World.

4000527.name: Male Mannequin's Fedora
4000527.desc: A black fedora that the Male Mannequin was wearing.

4000529.name: Greatest Oldies

4000530.name: Blue Perfume

4000532.name: Yellow Perfume
4000532.desc: A freesia-scented perfume. Fresh and smooth.

4000534.name: Pink Perfume
4000534.desc: A rose-scented perfume. Light and airy.

4000537.name: Fancy Amplifier Cables
4000537.desc: Fancy cables that connect to fancy amplifiers.

4000538.name: Spirit of Rock's Music Score
4000538.desc: A music score that Spirit of Rock treasures.

4000539.name: Cherry Bubble

4000540.name: Melon Bubble
4000540.desc: Sweet melon-flavored bubble from a melon bubble tea.

4000541.name: Mango Bubble
4000541.desc: Sweet mango-flavored bubble from a mango bubble tea.

4000542.name: Yeti Keychain
4000542.desc: A cute keychain with a dangling Yeti doll.

4000543.name: Jr. Pepe Keychain
4000543.desc: A cute keychain with a dangling Jr. Pepe doll.

4000544.name: Orange Mushroom Doll
4000544.desc: A pretty Orange Mushroom doll from the claw vending machine.

4000545.name: Red Squishy Liquid
4000545.desc: Cherry-scented jelly from a Red Slime.

4000546.name: Silver Squishy Liquid
4000546.desc: Jelly from a Silver Slime. It looks pretty heavy.

4000547.name: Gold Squishy Liquid
4000547.desc: Jelly from a Gold Slime. It looks expensive.

4000548.name: Overlord A Radar Device
4000548.desc: A radar that detects anything within a 10m radius.

4000549.name: Overlord B Radar Device
4000549.desc: A radar that detects anything within a 30m radius.

4000550.name: Robby's Electronic Induction Device
4000550.desc: A device that communicates using the nearest inductive material.

4000551.name: Iruvata Laser Sword
4000551.desc: Iruvata's laser sword, which can be used as a weapon.

4000552.name: Afterlord Chained Tire
4000552.desc: Appears durable enough to maneuver through the wilderness.

4000553.desc: This propulsion system uses nitrogen energy as its propellant.

4000554.name: Maverick Type A Component
4000554.desc: A component of Maverick Type A that is abrasion-resistant due to its ergonomic design.

4000555.name: Maverick Type S Laser Gun
4000555.desc: A high-tech laser gun that consumes minimal energy yet ejects maximum power.

4000556.name: Maverick Type D Booster
4000556.desc: A booster that provides a temporary increase in thrust for flight.

4000557.name: Imperial Guard Vacuum Tube
4000557.desc: A vacuum tube that uses air pressure to maintain an output of at least 5 tons.

4000558.name: Royal Guard Armor

4000628.name: Vulture's Shoulder Accessory
4000628.desc: A shoulder piece from the Grey Vulture.

4000629.name: Castle Golem Brick
4000629.desc: A brick that was once part of the Castle Golem's body.

4000630.name: Purification Totem
4000630.desc: A small totem engraved with a picture of a lion, with the power to break the Lion King's curse. To purify the corruption of the castle, many are needed.

4000673.name: Grassy Mud Clump

4000674.name: Chao's Tusk
4000674.desc: A sharp, solid tusk from Chao. A major step up for pointy tusks.

4000676.name: Shining Fairy's Wings
4000676.desc: These wings have a bright green glow.

4001000.name: Arwen's Glass Shoes
4001000.desc: A shiny glass shoes for women-only.

4001002.name: The Girl Next Door
4001002.desc: A book with a dangerous content.

4001003.name: Old Gold Watch
4001003.desc: An old gold watch. An article left by Alex's late mother.

4001004.name: "Blackbull's" deed to the land
4001004.desc: A lost deed to the land for "Blackbull" of Perion.

4001005.name: Ancient Scroll
4001005.desc: A scroll from long ago that contains powerful, mysterious magic from then.

4001006.name: Flaming Feather
4001006.desc: A flame with the look of a feather. It never stops burning.

4001007.name: Coupon
4001007.desc: A coupon earned by taking down a monster. Can be traded with a pass.

4001008.name: Pass
4001008.desc: A pass earned by trading with a coupon. Can only advance to the next stage with a pass.

4001015.name: Paper Document
4001015.desc: A document that contains informations about the studies on return scrolls. Collect these to exchange with return scroll to Mines.

4001016.name: The Key
4001016.desc: An important key that'll allow access to the huge tresure chest at the Mine Quest.

4001017.name: Eye of Fire
4001017.desc: A manmade seed of Zakum tree, which is actually sealed up. Used as the sacrifice to the altar.

4001018.name: Fire Ore
4001018.desc: The ore that contains the power of fire. Used as a material for the sacrifice to the altar.

4001019.name: Orbis Rock Scroll
4001019.desc: Use it at the magic rock on either the 1st or the 20th floor of Orbis Tower to teleport to one another.

4001020.name: Eos Rock Scroll
4001020.desc: You can transport to the other Eos Rocks by activating them using this scroll

4001022.name: Pass of Dimension
4001022.desc: A pass earned through defeating the monster. Need the pass to move to the next level.

4001023.name: Key of Dimension
4001023.desc: A key possessed by Alishar. It can be used to block the entrances that leads to other places.

4001024.name: Rubian
4001024.desc: A breathtakingly beautiful red jewel. Need to be careful not to be too enamored with its color, though.

4001025.name: Longinus Spear
4001025.desc: A spear of mythical force. It contains elements that disables the seal of Eregoth.

4001026.name: Key
4001026.desc: A key made out of pure gold that is used to open a locked door.

4001103.name: Cornian's Marrow
4001103.desc: A solvent that contained the force of Cornian. Emits a mysterious color.

4001107.name: [Storybook]Black book
4001107.desc: A book with a black cover.  I got a eery and evil energy from it and could not open it. I should take it to Bishop Gritto.\nOnly for : #cBishop#

4001108.name: Cold Flame
4001108.desc: A small flame that'll slowly build up to be a cold fire.

4001109.name: Hardened Glass Bottle
4001109.desc: A glass bottle that can hold the lava's marrow. One of the materials used while making the bottle was a diamond; thus, the bottle is multiple times more powerful than a regular glass bottle.

4001110.name: [Storybook] Unknown Letter
4001110.desc: It's an anonymous letter.  It just said #c 'I have what you want.  Meet me at the Cloud Balcony'#.\nOnly for : #cNight Lord#

4001111.name: [Storybook] Crimson Balrog's Proposal
4001111.desc: It's half of the note about the plan to kidnap Tylus that Crimson Balrog had.\nOnly for : #c4th job Warrior#

4001112.name: [Storybook] Indecipherable Book
4001112.desc: It's a book written with monster language that I can't read.  Would Manji know about the book?\nOnly for : #c4th Job Warrior#

4001113.name: Phoenix's Egg
4001113.desc: An egg of a legendary bird Phoenix.

4001114.name: Freezer's Egg
4001114.desc: An egg of a legendary bird Freezer.

4001115.name: Undine's Cloth
4001115.desc: An arcane piece of cloth from Undine, the powerful water spirit. Something may happen if this is combined with the Monster Eraser...

4001116.name: Hectagon Necklace
4001116.desc: A beautiful piece of necklace featuring the hexagon-shaped jewelry. Something may happen if brought with the Monster Eraser...

4001117.name: Old Metal Key
4001117.desc: An old metal key used to lock the door of the pirate ship.

4001118.name: Piece of the Pirate Map
4001118.desc: A ripped piece of the map that featured the routes the pirates took.

4001119.name: Pirate Map
4001119.desc: It's the map that details the routes that the pirates take.

4001120.desc: A mark that signifies that the owner is in the lower ranks among the pirates.

4001121.name: Mark of the Rising Pirate
4001121.desc: A mark that signifies that the owner is in the middle ranks among the pirates.

4001122.name: Mark of the Veteran Pirate
4001122.desc: A mark that signifies that the owner is in the top ranks among the pirates.

4001123.name: Transparent Item
4001123.desc: A transparent item for summoning Wu Yang.

4001124.name: Dr. Do's Marble
4001124.desc: It's the marble I received after giving medicinal ingredients to Dr. Do.

4001125.name: Bloctopus Blueprint
4001125.desc: A blueprint that contains information on constructing a Bloctoplus.

4001127.name: Fuse
4001127.desc: This is used to make firecrackers.

4001128.name: Powder keg
4001128.desc: This is used to make firecrackers.

4001129.name: Maple Coin
4001129.desc: A maple mark is engrained on this shiny coin.  Exchangeable for an item via Spiegelmann.

4001130.name: Romeo's Letter
4001130.desc: A letter that Romeo wrote to Juliet, warning of a suspicious plan that is to occur.

4001131.name: Juliet's Letter
4001131.desc: A letter that Juliet wrote to Romeo, warning of a suspicious plan that is to occur.

4001132.name: Suspicious Liquid
4001132.desc: A bottle that contains a green liquid that has been treated with a peculiar chemical.

4001133.name: Card Key
4001133.desc: The card key that allows you to enter Eurek's special laboratory.

4001134.name: Alcadno's Experiment Files
4001134.desc: Research information on Alcadno's stolen ingredient.

4001135.name: Zenumist's Experiment Files
4001135.desc: Research information on Zenumist's stolen ingredient.

4001136.name: Piece of Scroll
4001136.desc: A piece of a scroll.  I should collect the pieces and take it to Cassandra before September 19th, 2008.

4001141.name: Snowman Branch
4001141.desc: A tree branch used to make a Kid Snowman arm. Represents a pure innocense of the kids that made the Snowman.

4001156.name: Pass of Dimension
4001156.desc: A pass earned by defeating a monster. This pass is required in order to enter the next stage.

4001157.name: Star Stamp
4001157.desc: A star stamp earned by protecting the candle given by the Administrator.

4001158.name: Feather of Goddess
4001158.desc: A feather from Minerva the Goddess.

4001159.name: Zenumist Marble
4001159.desc: A marble taken care of by Romeo.

4001160.name: Alcadno Marble
4001160.desc: A marble taken care of by Juliet.

4001161.name: Concentrated Poison
4001161.desc: This poison is too strong for anyone to handle.

4001162.name: Diluted Poison
4001162.desc: This poison has been diluted with water. It can now be handled.

4001163.name: Purple Stone of Magic
4001163.desc: It's a magic stone that's purple.\nIt can probably trigger a reaction from something...

4001164.name: Golem's Marble
4001164.desc: It's the essence of Poison Golem. It will have to be cleansed in clear spring water.

4001165.name: Sunshine
4001165.desc: Maple Tree loves this sunshine. Give it an ample amount of sunshine, and the tree will grow.

4001166.name: Snow Silk
4001166.desc: A ball of silk that's cold like snow, as if it'll melt away.

4001167.name: Piece of Birthday Cake
4001167.desc: A piece of the MapleStory's 4 Year Anniversary cake.  You can complete the cake by opening the cake box and placing 4 cake pieces on the plate.

4001168.name: Golden Maple Leaf
4001168.desc: A Golden Maple Leaf that fell from a Maple Tree specially for MapleStory's 4 Year Anniversary.  Take it to the keeper of the maple tree and receive a special present.

4001169.name: Monster Marble
4001169.desc: This marble contains a poisoned monster. The monster is being purified within it

4001174.name: Practice Shoes
4001174.desc: The most basic form of shoes for practice.

4001175.name: Kid Shoes
4001175.desc: Adorable cute shoes that are obviously only for dids.

4001176.name: Shovel
4001176.desc: A small shovel with a short handle for easier shoveling.

4001178.name: Beach Sandals
4001178.desc: A pair of sandals perfect for walking around the beach on a hot summer day.

4001179.name: Water Gun for Training
4001179.desc: It looks exactly like the Laser Gun, but it's a water gun, making it an optimal weapon for training.

4001180.name: Gloves for Outside
4001180.desc: A durable pair of gloves perfect for outside.

4001181.name: Mittens
4001181.desc: A warm, red furry pair of mittens.

4001182.name: Clean Mop
4001182.desc: A clean mop that hasn't been used yet.

4001183.name: Training Uniform
4001183.desc: A white training uniform featuring a red belt. The uniform lets in air and is very light, so the students won't pass out training under the sun.

4001184.name: Durable Rake
4001184.desc: A metal rake used to rake the farm.

4001185.name: Warm Fur Boots
4001185.desc: A pair of warm fur boots that goes up to the ankle.

4001186.name: King's Turban
4001186.desc: A special turban ordered by Abdullah VIII. Very fancy, to say the least.

4001187.name: Beltin
4001187.desc: A mysterious fish that allows one to sing well and in tune after eating it.

4001188.name: Breakin
4001188.desc: A mysterious fish that allows one to rock the dance floor after eating it.

4001189.name: Poppin
4001189.desc: A mysterious fish that allows one to sing well and in rhythm after eaten it.

4001190.name: Blackhole Marble
4001190.desc: Inside a clear marble, there is a black hole like figure swirling around.

4001191.name: Excellent Agent Badge
4001191.desc: A badge that is given to an agent who accomplishes their mission with excellence.

4001192.name: Intelligence Document
4001192.desc: Intelligence document that contains investigations regarding Master M and party quest monsters.

4001193.name: Transparent Item for Lightning
4001193.desc: A transparent item for lightning expressions.

4001198.name: Altaire Fragment
4001198.desc: This is given to those who save Altaire Camp from Forest of Poison Haze.

4001199.name: Straw
4001199.desc: A warm set of straws used to make a bird's nest. Gather them all up, and bring them together and show them to Gaga.

4001201.name: Funny Travel Stories
4001201.desc: A tape that contained all the fun adventure stories recorded while on the road.

4001202.name: Top 10 Pop Star Hits
4001202.desc: A tape that only contained the lastest from radio and tv.

4001203.name: Manji's Ragged Diary
4001203.desc: An old, ragged diary that includes the war stories of Manji in Perion. Let's return it to the Maple Admin.

4001204.name: Gwin's Travel Stories
4001204.desc: A collection of travel storries that Gwin wrote. Need to hand it back to the Maple Admin.

4001205.name: Ericsson's Travel Stories
4001205.desc: A handwritten, gripping account of Ericsson's days as an explorer.

4001207.name: Black Scale
4001207.desc: A scale that's slightly dyed in black. Something doesn't seem right with this.

4001214.name: Richie Gold - Golden Key
4001214.desc: A key that leads to Richie Gold's treasure storage. Entering this storage alone requires 3 keys. \n#cRelated Quest:Richie Gold's Maze

4001215.name: Whatever Charm
4001215.desc: A charm that lets one skip a mission.

4001231.name: Candy Cane
4001231.desc: A Chrismas Candy Cane for Jump Event

4001232.name: White Gift Box
4001232.desc: A white gift box that can be found inside the New Year's Lucky Pouch. Bring it to the Game Administrator to receive a gift from the box.

4001233.name: Red Gift Box
4001233.desc: A red gift box that can be found inside the New Year's Lucky Pouch. Bring it to the Game Administrator to receive a gift from the box.

4001234.name: Blue Gift Box
4001234.desc: A blue gift box that can be found inside the New Year's Lucky Pouch. Bring it to the Game Administrator to receive a gift from the box.

4001235.name: Purple Gift Box
4001235.desc: A purple gift box that can be found inside the New Year's Lucky Pouch. Bring it to the Game Administrator to receive a gift from the box.

4001237.name: Slightly Polluted Rock
4001237.desc: This rock has a slight hint of that unmistakable force of darkness.

4001238.name: Polluted Rock
4001238.desc: This rock really has the force of Black Mage stored in it.

4001239.name: Heavily Polluted Rock
4001239.desc: This rock contains a powerful force of Black Mage stored in it.

4001240.name: Polluted Item
4001240.desc: A piece of rock that has been irreparable damaged because of the force of the Black Mage.

4001245.name: Pigmy's Golden Egg
4001245.desc: Pigmy's Golden Egg. It can only be hatched by a fairy from a fairytale.

4001246.name: Warm Sunlight
4001246.desc: Drop the Warm Sunlight in front of the Bean Stalk to make it grow.

4001247.name: Story Treasure Box
4001247.desc: A Treasure Box hidden in the Dungeon.

4001249.name: Maple Necklace Gem
4001249.desc: A beautiful gem that can be set on the Mind of Maple Necklace.

4001250.name: Maple Necklace Pendant
4001250.desc: This can be used to create the Mind of Maple Necklace.

4001254.name: Shiny Maple Coin
4001254.desc: An octagonal gold coin with a maple mark. The Shiny Maple Coins can be traded for items from Spiegelmann.

4001255.name: Golden Pig's Hard Egg
4001255.desc: It's too hard to open. It may be a good idea to bring it to Goldrich.

4001256.name: Primal Claw
4001256.desc: A symbolic weapon of Thief mastery.  Although it can't be equipped, its power is palpable.  This item must be placed in the Altar of Mastery to activate it.

4001257.name: Staff of First Magic
4001257.desc: A symbolic weapon of Mage mastery.  Although it can't be equipped, its power is palpable.  This item must be placed in the Altar of Mastery to activate it.

4001258.name: Ancestral Bow
4001258.desc: A symbolic weapon of Bowman mastery.  Although it can't be equipped, its power is palpable.  This item must be placed in the Altar of Mastery to activate it.

4001259.name: Master Sword
4001259.desc: A symbolic weapon of Warrior mastery.  Although it can't be equipped, its power is palpable.  This item must be placed in the Altar of Mastery to activate it.

4001260.name: Forbidden Gun
4001260.desc: A symbolic weapon of Pirate mastery.  Although it can't be equipped, its power is palpable.  This item must be placed in the Altar of Mastery to activate it.

4001261.name: Piece of Balrog Leather
4001261.desc: A piece of leather from a Balrog's rough hide.

4001264.name: Shepherd Boy's Lunch.
4001264.desc: This is a Shepherd Boy's Lunch. Collect and deliver them to the Lamb. You can get a reward when you win.

4001268.name: Brown Krypto Crystal
4001268.desc: A Brown Krypto Crystal containing the mysterious energies of space.

4001269.name: Emerald Krypto Crystal
4001269.desc: An Emerald Krypto Crystal containing the mysterious energies of space.

4001270.desc: An item that is falsely rumored to be only visible to warm-hearted children. Take it to Cassandra.

4001272.name: Giant Nependeath Seed
4001272.desc: A seed from a Giant Nependeath. It's very big.

4001300.name: Granada
4001300.desc: A captivating single rose loved by the Witch.

4001301.desc: A permit that allows one to dig up relics. Talk to Gaga to receive another permit.

4001302.name: Valuable Artifact
4001302.desc: A relic that looks very rare.

4001303.name: Petrified Mouse
4001303.desc: The first of 8 treasures mentioned by Shuang.

4001304.name: Gaga's Glasses
4001304.desc: The second of 8 treasures mentioned by Shuang.

4001305.name: Cassandra's Crystal Ball
4001305.desc: The third of 8 treasures mentioned by Shuang.

4001306.name: The Shiny Watch
4001306.desc: The fourth of 8 treasures mentioned by Shuang.

4001307.name: A Soccer Cleat
4001307.desc: The fifth of 8 treasures mentioned by Shuang.

4001308.name: The Quest Completion Book
4001308.desc: The sixth of 8 treasures mentioned by Shuang.

4001309.name: A Pretty Hair-Tie
4001309.desc: The seventh of 8 treasures mentioned by Shuang.

4001310.name: An Old Shoe
4001310.desc: The last of 8 treasures mentioned by Shuang.

4001311.name: Ancient Relic
4001311.desc: A relic that appears to be very old.

4001316.name: Cassandra's Album
4001316.desc: A photo album filled with Cassandra's baby pictures.

4001317.name: Helmet Pepe's Helmet
4001317.desc: A helmet worn by Helmet Pepe. Put it on to disguise yourself as a Helmet Pepe.

4001318.name: The Royal Seal of the Mushking Empire
4001318.desc: The Royal Seal that represents the power of the Mushking Empire.

4001320.name: Flower Tube Coupon
4001320.desc: Take this to Cassandra, and exchange it for a pretty Pink Flower Tube.

4001321.name: Train 999 Boarding Pass
4001321.desc: Allows one to board Train 999 through Mr. Lim.

4001322.name: Pharaoh Yeti's Sapphire
4001322.desc: A sapphire mounted on Pharaoh Yeti's necklace. Give it to Duarte, and he'll take you to Pharaoh Yeti's tomb.

4001323.name: Pharaoh Yeti's Ruby
4001323.desc: A ruby mounted on Pharaoh Yeti's necklace. Give it to Duarte, and he'll take you to Pharaoh Yeti's tomb.

4001324.name: Pharaoh Yeti's Emerald
4001324.desc: An emerald mounted on Pharaoh Yeti's necklace. Give it to Duarte, and he'll take you to Pharaoh Yeti's tomb.

4001325.name: Pharaoh Yeti's Topaz
4001325.desc: A topaz mounted on Pharaoh Yeti's necklace. Give it to Duarte, and he'll take you to Pharaoh Yeti's tomb.

4001326.name: Red Crayon
4001326.desc: A red crayon. Use it to color in the picture of the rainbow.

4001327.name: Orange Crayon
4001327.desc: An orange crayon. Use it to color in the picture of the rainbow.

4001328.name: Yellow Crayon
4001328.desc: A yellow crayon. Use it to color in the picture of the rainbow.

4001329.name: Green Crayon
4001329.desc: A green crayon. Use it to color in the picture of the rainbow.

4001330.name: Blue Crayon
4001330.desc: A blue crayon. Use it to color in the picture of the rainbow.

4001331.name: Indigo Crayon
4001331.desc: An Indigo crayon. Use it to color in the picture of the rainbow.

4001332.name: Violet Crayon
4001332.desc: A violet crayon. Use it to color in the picture of the rainbow.

4001333.name: Pot

4001334.name: Yellow Flower Pot
4001334.desc: A small pot that contains a yellow flower. Take it to Gaga to trade it for a crayon.

4001339.name: Treacherous Fox Tail
4001339.desc: The tail of a Treacherous Fox. It seems pretty useless, especially since it is covered in coarse fur.

4001340.name: Foreign Object
4001340.desc: A green-colored foreign object that was blocking the pipes. Looks very dirty.

4001341.name: Broken Iron Fragment
4001341.desc: Looks like a fragment that broke off of something...?

4001342.name: Pig Shaped Bottle
4001342.desc: Wine would taste great in this bottle.

4001345.name: Sunglasses
4001345.desc: Looks like it belongs to a rock star.

4001347.name: Ellinia Tree Barrel

4031667.desc: A water bottle with shiny purple liquid inside.  You can capture emotions in it.

4031683.name: Maya's seal of love

4031688.desc: This is a seal of true love given by Tigun.

4031689.name: Muse's seal of love
4031689.desc: This is a seal of true love given by Muse.

4031690.name: Pam's seal of love
4031690.desc: This is a seal of true love given by Pam.

4031691.name: Taesoo's Proof of Love
