4031692.name: Jiyur's Proof of Love
4031692.desc: A badge of love that Jiyur gave me, acknowledging the sincerity of my love.

4031693.name: Mute's Model
4031693.desc: A miniature model of Mute.  It was made for research purposes by the alchemists.

4031694.name: Lumo's Leaf
4031694.desc: A rare leaf obtained from Lumo.  It contains the power of life but can easily die if mistreated.

4031695.name: Snow Rose
4031695.desc: A rose that is white like snow.  It was created by the alchemists.

4031696.name: Snow Rose Seed
4031696.desc: A small and white seed.  It can grow into a snow rose but you'll need to use alchemy to raise it.

4031697.name: Silver Pendant
4031697.desc: A pendant with a rose engraving.  It is not yet attached to a chain.

4031698.name: Magic Device
4031698.desc: A device that has a gem that controls magic.  Only the alchemists know how it works.

4031699.name: Drop of Sun
4031699.desc: A cure for fairies made by fairies.  It's been made by sunlight.

4031700.name: Drop of Moon
4031700.desc: A cure for fairies made by fairies.  It's been made by moonlight.

4031701.name: Chumji's Watermelon
4031701.desc: Sweet watermelon that is grown from Chumji's field.

4031702.name: Transparent Item
4031702.desc: A transparent item that is used to fight off the watermelon keeper.

4031703.name: Regular Tree Branch
4031703.desc: A regular looking tree branch.  It doesn't seem to have any special powers.

4031704.name: Anonymous Research Report
4031704.desc: A research report that an unknown person compiled.  The research seems to be about using metal to strengthen your body.

4031705.name: Strange Bottle of Water
4031705.desc: A water bottle containing transparent water.  It is tightly locked.

4031706.name: Phyllia's Letter
4031706.desc: A letter Phyllia wrote to Erikson.  It seems to be about Kini's condition.

4031707.name: Ericsson's Letter
4031707.desc: A letter Ericsson wrote to Phyllia. It seems to be about the medicine for Keeny.

4031708.name: Secret Document
4031708.desc: A secretive document written with codes.  The bottom part is badly damaged and not readable.

4031709.name: Lightless Magic Device
4031709.desc: A magic device that has been completely used up.  There is no more use for it.

4031710.name: Subway Ticket to NLC (Basic)
4031710.desc: A basic ticket needed to get on the subway that goes from Kerning City to New Leaf City of Masteria Continent.

4031711.name: Subway Ticket to NLC (Regular)
4031711.desc: A Regular ticket needed to get on the subway that goes from Kerning City to New Leaf City of Masteria Continent.

4031712.name: Subway Ticket to Kerning City (Basic)
4031712.desc: A basic ticket needed to get on the subway that goes from New Leaf City to Kerning City of Victoria Island.

4031713.name: Subway Ticket to Kerning City (Regular)
4031713.desc: A Regular ticket needed to get on the subway that goes from New Leaf City to Kerning City of Victoria Island.

4031729.name: A slice of Ham
4031729.desc: A slice of Ham that looks tasty.

4031730.name: A small tomato
4031730.desc: A small tomato taken out of the Giant Tomato.

4031731.name: Ticket to Singapore (From Kerning City)
4031731.desc: A regular ticket needed to get on the plane that heads from Kerning City to Changi airport.

4031732.name: Ticket to Kerning City (From CBD)
4031732.desc: A regular ticket needed to get on the plane that heads from Changi airport to Kerning City.

4031733.name: Ticket to Singapore (From Orbis)
4031733.desc: A regular ticket needed to get on the plane that heads from Oribs to Changi airport.

4031734.name: Ticket to Orbis (From CBD)
4031734.desc: A regular ticket needed to get on the plane that heads from Changi airport to Orbis.

4031737.name: Homunculus's Blood
4031737.desc: Blood that is made by Homunculus's magic.  It has the power to reveal truth.

4031738.name: Dran's Medicine
4031738.desc: Medicine that Dran made for his daughter Kini.  It seems rather ordinary but it is actually very difficult to make.

4031739.name: Magic Stone of Humility
4031739.desc: An orange magic stone that signifies humility. What kind of powers does this item have?

4031740.name: Magic Stone of Honesty
4031740.desc: A green magic stone that signifies honesty. What kind of powers does this item have?

4031741.name: Magic Stone of Trust
4031741.desc: A blue magic stone that signifies trust. What kind of powers does this item have?

4031743.name: Unknown Medicine
4031743.desc: A medicine carried by Humanoid A. There's no way to tell what kind of effect it has when consumed.

4031744.name: Silver Pendant
4031744.desc: A pendant with a rose engraving.  It seems to be missing its chain.

4031745.name: Parwen's Entry Pass
4031745.desc: Entry pass that was used by Parwen.  It looks like any other entry passes but has a different number on it.

4031748.name: Malt
4031748.desc: One of the most important ingredients of the German Beer.

4031749.name: Ticket to the Beer Tent
4031749.desc: The ticket that allows you to enter the Beer tent.

4031750.name: Dark Matter
4031750.desc: Strange matter from the depths of space.  When used in the construction of items, who knows what effect it'll have!

4031751.name: Vorticular Gyro
4031751.desc: A futuristic machine part that perpetually makes whirling noises.  Once a part of a bigger machine, it can be used to create something new.

4031752.name: Blinking Dingbat
4031752.desc: A futuristic machine part that blinks steadily and mysteriously.  It's original use is unknown but it can be broken down to create something else.

4031753.name: Zeta Residue
4031753.desc: Residual matter from the explosion of a distant dying star that's taken eons to reach here.

4031754.name: Black Versal Materia
4031754.desc: A form of concentrated energy, harvested from the alternate dimension of Versal. The dark energy denotes a chaotic element.

4031755.name: Taru Totem
4031755.desc: An ancient totem that pulses with mystic energy.

4031756.name: Mystic Astrolabe
4031756.desc: A golden instrument used for navigation.  Said to have magical effects when combined with other items.

4031757.name: Antellion Relic
4031757.desc: An old world tablet with strange markings. These are said to combine with other objects.

4031758.name: Naricain Jewel
4031758.desc: A lost jewel created by Naricain, the demon sorceror. Said to add tremendous dark power to crafted items.

4031759.name: Subani Ankh
4031759.desc: One of Subani's Ankhs. Said to have protective powers and ward off darkness.

4031760.name: White Versal Materia
4031760.desc: A form of concentrated energy, harvested from the alternate dimension of Versal. The blinding white energy indicates it is still unstable.

4031761.name: Materia Orb
4031761.desc: Materia from Versal that has been stabilized into an orb form.  It still pulses with energy.

4031764.name: Paranormal Activity Report Page
4031764.desc: A page from a file detailing strange activity and possible locations for ghosts.  It doesn't look very professional.

4031765.name: Blank Paranormal Subject Questionnaire
4031765.desc: This is an official MBI form that is intended for gathering data on paranormal subjects.  It is currently blank.

4031766.name: Completed Paranormal Subject Questionnaire
4031766.desc: This official MBI form has been completed by a paranormal subject.  Hmmm... very interesting information.

4031767.name: Sophilia's First Doll
4031767.desc: A worn, happy looking doll that has seen better days.

4031768.name: "Perfect" Sophilia Doll
4031768.desc: A doll that is a chilling likeness of Sophilia but looks odd and unnatural.

4031769.name: Tarrymore Earring
4031769.desc: This beautiful, elegant earring belongs to Ludmilla.

4031770.name: Sepha Earring
4031770.desc: This expensive, stylish earring belongs to Ludmilla.

4031771.name: Omni Key
4031771.desc: A strange key kept in excellent condition. Can be used to enter fireplaces in the Prendergast Mansion.

4031772.name: Toy Workshop Key
4031772.desc: Jonas' key to his Toy Workshop at the top of the Prendergast Mansion.

4031773.name: Dry Branch
4031773.desc: An arid branch so devoid of water, it looks like even the slightest touch might break it.

4031774.name: Yulete's Lab Report
4031774.desc: A compilation of Yulete's lab work and research. Very neat!

4031775.name: Frankenroid's Blueprint
4031775.desc: A blueprint of Frankenroid created by Yulete.

4031776.name: Sirin's Pattern
4031776.desc: The pattern of the clothes Sirin designed. Comes with a detailed step-by-step guide for beginners.

4031777.name: Juliet's Present
4031777.desc: Juliet made this for Romeo. What kind of guy would enjoy this as a gift?

4031778.name: Romeo's Love Letter
4031778.desc: A letter Romeo wrote to profess his love for Juliet.

4031779.name: Juliet's Lunch Box
4031779.desc: A lunch box Juliet made for Romeo. I am not sure if the food inside is completely edible...I'll let Romeo try it instead.

4031780.name: Mysterious Red Liquid
4031780.desc: A red liquid Yulete made for the combination of reagents.

4031781.name: Mysterious Green Liquid
4031781.desc: A green liquid Yulete made for the combination of reagents.

4031782.name: Mysterious Yellow Liquid
4031782.desc: A yellow liquid Yulete made for the combination of reagents.

4031783.name: Mysterious Blue Liquid
4031783.desc: A blue liquid Yulete made for the combination of reagents.

4031784.name: Mysterious Purple Liquid
4031784.desc: A purple liquid Yulete made for the combination of reagents.

4031785.name: Lunchbox Recipe
4031785.desc: A lunch box recipe sold by Han the Broker. The author's name is on the cover - H. No way it's written by Han the Broker...

4031786.name: Xuzhu's Letter
4031786.desc: Xuzhu’s letter to Guoqing asking for his whereabouts.

4031787.name: Guoqing letter
4031787.desc: Guoqing’s letter to Xuzhu reporting that he is safe.

4031788.name: Red Marble
4031788.desc: A glowing Red Marble Master Goblin prepared for Do Gong. Apparently it helps mastering spells.

4031789.name: Antidote Marble
4031789.desc: An antidote to King Sage Cat's poison.

4031790.name: Small Clue
4031790.desc: A cloth from a robe found from Tri-Tailed Foxes. This may explain Chil Nam's bizarre behavior.

4031791.name: Ice Crystal
4031791.desc: A piece of ice with mysterious powers that may recover the Statue of the Spirit of Snow.

4031792.name: Mushroom Candy
4031792.desc: A sweet candy that resembles a mushroom.

4031793.name: Old Fox's Tail
4031793.desc: One of the tails from the Old Fox. Very soft and shiny.

4031794.name: Tae Soo's Peach
4031794.desc: A special Peach Tae Soo plucked out of the Peach Farm with Tae Sang's blessings. Only the sweetest and the most delicious Peaches can be found here.

4031795.name: Cat Doll Under a Spell
4031795.desc: A cat doll from Sage Cat with a spell from Do Gong.

4031796.name: Yulete's Lab Report
4031796.desc: A compilation of Yulete's lab work and research. The notes, while very neat, are complicated.

4031797.name: Yulete's Report
4031797.desc: A report full of notes from Yulete's various expriments.

4031798.name: Finished Reagent
4031798.desc: A reagent made with a combination of liquids.

4031799.name: Romeo's Snow Rose
4031799.desc: A snow rose from Romeo to Juliet.

4031800.name: Maria's Letter

4031801.name: Lucas's Recommendation Letter
4031801.desc: A recommendation letter from Lucas for a beginner.

4031802.name: Jr. Sentinel Shellpiece

4031803.name: An Empty Beer Mug
4031803.desc: A mug that has no beer in it.

4031805.name: Bob's Snail Shell

4031806.name: Romeo's Engagement Ring

4031811.name: Sophilia's First Doll
4031811.desc: A worn, happy looking doll that has seen better days.

4031812.name: Paranormal Activity Report Page
4031812.desc: A page from a file detailing strange activity and possible locations for ghosts.  It doesn't look very professional.

4031815.name: Heartstopper

4031816.name: Pumpkin Taffy

4031818.name: Green Gummy Slime
4031818.desc: Super-chewy gummy slimes. This one is cherry-flavored.  If only real Slimes tasted this good.

4031819.name: Purple Gummy Slime
4031819.desc: Super-chewy gummy slimes. This one is cherry-flavored.  If only real Slimes tasted this good.

4031820.name: Orange Gummy Slime
4031820.desc: Super-chewy gummy slimes. This one is cherry-flavored.  If only real Slimes tasted this good.

4031827.name: Sirius Cloak Forging Manual
4031827.desc: Professor Foxwit's blueprint for creating a Sirius Cloak.

4031828.name: Dark Shard Earrings Forging Manual
4031828.desc: Professor Foxwit's blueprint for creating Dark Shard Earrings.

4031829.name: Black Phoenix Shield Forging Manual
4031829.desc: Professor Foxwit's blueprint for creating a Black Phoenix Shield.

4031830.name: Ghost Sack
4031830.desc: A strange sack that contains ghosts. If I mistakenly open this, I feel like a million ghosts might try and possess me.

4031831.name: Mirror Piece
4031831.desc: A piece of a mirror. If I have this with me, I'll be able to see ghosts with my own eyes.

4031833.name: Pumpkin Juice
4031833.desc: A juice made with pumpkin. It is very fragrant.

4031834.name: Perfect Tool
4031834.desc: The most perfect tool for making dolls.

4031835.name: Lyudmilla’s Earring
4031835.desc: The earrings that Lyudmilla lost. They shine with brilliance.

4031836.name: Score
4031836.desc: The score that Lyudmilla asked for. No one knows what kind of music is in it.

4031837.name: Dumped Doll
4031837.desc: A doll that Sophelia used to cherish a long time ago. She threw it away when she got a new doll.

4031838.name: Piece of Cloth
4031838.desc: A small piece of cloth. If you drag and drop it onto the rag doll, the doll will be completed bit by bit.

4031839.name: Crumpled Letter
4031839.desc: An old, crumpled letter. It is extremely damaged and therefore not very legible.

4031840.name: Old Orgel
4031840.desc: A beautiful, yet old orgel that shows the traces of time. Written on the inside of the orgel are the words, "For Dear Miss Helena".

4031841.name: Magic Flask (Empty)
4031841.desc: An empty bottle that can be filled with magic.

4031842.name: Magic Flask (Filled)
4031842.desc: The Vigor of the Sea fills this magic flask.

4031844.name: Rolonay's Research Report
4031844.desc: A report document compiled by Rolonay in response to Dr. Kim's research request.

4031845.name: Daily Log
4031845.desc: Bart's log report of various happenings nearby, as seen from the watchtower.

4031846.name: Black Magician's Token
4031846.desc: A token of proof that one is a follower of the Black Magician.

4031848.name: Milk Jug (1/3)
4031848.desc: A jug filled with 1/3rd of milk. Exact measurements.

4031849.name: Milk Jug (2/3)
4031849.desc: A jug filled with 2/3rds of milk.  Exact measurements.

4031850.name: Milk Jug (Full)
4031850.desc: A jug filled to the brim with milk. Don't spill it!

4031851.name: Whalean Canned Food
4031851.desc: Kenta's special, canned delicacy of cooked sea horse tail, beloved by Whales.

4031852.name: Dress
4031852.desc: A fancy, fashionable dress made by Madame Ming Ming herself.  The inscription says "Kyrin".

4031853.name: Abel's Glasses
4031853.desc: Abel's lost pair of glasses. Black, horn-rimmed and polished.

4031854.name: Miscellaneous Glasses
4031854.desc: Someone's lost pair of glasses. To whom do they belong?

4031855.name: Miscellaneous Glasses
4031855.desc: Someone's lost pair of glasses. To whom do they belong?

4031856.name: Potent Power Crystal
4031856.desc: A Power Crystal that contains concentrated monster power.

4031857.name: Potent Wind Crystal
4031857.desc: A Wind Crystal that contains concentrated dexterity extract, drained from evasive monsters.  Enables agility.

4031859.name: Recommendation Letter for 4th Job Advancement
4031859.desc: A recommendation letter written by the Chiefs in El Nath to  the Priest of Minar Forest.

4031860.name: Heroic Pentagon
4031860.desc: A pentagon-shaped badge proving one's status as a hero.

4031861.name: Heroic Star
4031861.desc: A star-shaped pendant proving one's status as a hero.

4031862.name: Black Magician's Token
4031862.desc: A token of proof that one is a follower of the Black Magician.

4031863.name: Confidential Report
4031863.desc: A highly confidential report compiled by Baine. Keep it a secret!

4031864.name: Allowance
4031864.desc: Money from Mom and Dad. Can be used to purchase a Nexon Game Card.

4031865.name: Nexon Game Card - 100 points
4031865.desc: A Nexon Game Card worth 100 points. Will be redeemed into Maple Points!

4031866.name: Nexon Game Card - 250 points
4031866.desc: A Nexon Game Card worth 250 points. Will be redeemed into Maple Points!

4031867.name: A secret letter
4031867.desc: A secret letter that contains information about the traitorous MV.  Needs to be delivered to Charles the Adventurer.

4031868.name: Spirit Jewel
4031868.desc: A fossilized jewel which contains the pure essence of a monster in crystallized form. It gives off a potent aura of evil.

4031869.name: Papulatus' Key
4031869.desc: A mysterious key held by Papulatus. Wonder where the key might fit?

4031870.name: Papulatus' Key
4031870.desc: A mysterious key that enables separation from different dimensions. What did Papulatus use this key for?

4031871.name: Sturdy Leather
4031871.desc: Sturdy leather belonging to a Blue Dragon Turtle.

4031872.name: Heart of Stone
4031872.desc: A heart made of stone that can fill the Red Dragon Turtle's heart with cruelty.

4031873.name: Spirit Viking Flags
4031873.desc: The flag that the Spirit Vikings carry with them everywhere. They say that without this flag, they are not acknowledged as a Spirit Viking.

4031874.name: Spirit Viking Token
4031874.desc: A token of proof that one is a member of the Vikings. The Gigantic Spirit Vikings take this token with them wherever they go.

4031875.name: Nevermelting Snow
4031875.desc: A batch of snow that stays powdery. It never melts for some reason.

4031876.name: Flyers
4031876.desc: A flyer that contains some important message from Rooney on it.

4031877.name: Little Suzy's Wishlist
4031877.desc: Little Suzy's Wishlist. Neatly written in pencil. Must be taken to Maple Claws or O-Pongo.

4031878.name: Star of Maplemas Spirit
4031878.desc: The spirit of Maplemas, the holiday celebrated annually in the Maple World!

4031879.name: Orb of Versalmas Cheer
4031879.desc: The spirit of Versalmas, the holiday celebrating the 99 days of sunshine in Versal.

4031880.name: Stock Certificate for Grubber Industries
4031880.desc: A stock certificate good for one share in Mr. Grubber's company.  It may be worth a lot of money someday!

4031881.name: Picture of Rudolph
4031881.desc: Someone took a picture of Rudolph flying in the night sky of Happy ville. Rudolph seems happy in this picture.

4031882.name: Chimney Broom
4031882.desc: This will enable you to sweep inside the Chimney eventhough it is long and wide.

4031883.name: Flashlight
4031883.desc: This will enable you to light up the dark chimney.

4031884.name: Warm Milk
4031884.desc: This warm milk will help Icarus to go to bed.

4031885.name: Mapler Recommendation
4031885.desc: Recommendation written by Happyville people. #cItem cannot be dropped.#

4031886.name: Completed Socks
4031886.desc: Happyville Trend Socks made with skill from Mrs. Santa Claus. #cItem cannot be dropped.#

4031887.name: Tamed Rudolph
4031887.desc: A lost Rudolph that has been tamed through spells.

4031890.name: Warp Card
4031890.desc: A special card needed to travel to the Command Center in Omega Sector.  Can only be used inside the Nautilus' Warp Machine.

4031891.name: Gold Pouch
4031891.desc: A cloth pouch full of gold.

4031892.name: Tattered Map
4031892.desc: An old, tattered map from hundreds of years ago.

4031893.name: Byron's Recommendation Letter
4031893.desc: A recommendation letter from Byron the scholar. Give it to Kyrin at Notilus.

4031894.name: Crumpled Piece of Paper
4031894.desc: When this crumpled piece of paper is straightened out, some familiar names are featured. Jake, Shumi, Nella, Mr. Pickall...

4031895.name: Piece of Cheese
4031895.desc: A tasty piece of cheese, the main dish for mice.

4031896.name: Magic Reagent
4031896.desc: Pour it on the horoscope paper, and the future can be seen right then and there.

4031897.name: Ancient Helm
4031897.desc: An ancient, broken version of the Bosshunter Helm that has lost its original power.  With a magic ritual and the right spell components, this can be restored to its original, equippable condition.

4031898.name: Ancient Armor
4031898.desc: An ancient, broken version of the Bosshunter Armor that has lost its original power.  With a magic ritual and the right spell components, this can be restored to its original, equippable condition.

4031899.name: Ancient Greaves
4031899.desc: An ancient, broken version of the Bosshunter Greaves that has lost its original power.  With a magic ritual and the right spell components, this can be restored to its original, equippable condition.

4031900.name: Ridley's Book of Rituals
4031900.desc: A handy guide and how-to book for all things arcane.  No need to hire a professional magician, Ridley shows you how to do it yourself!

4031901.name: Papulatus Curl
4031901.desc: This is the curl taken from the top of Papulatus' head.

4031902.name: Tengu Nose
4031902.desc: This is the nose that has been cut off from Black Crow's face.

4031903.name: Jack O'Lantern
4031903.desc: This is the head of the Headless Horseman.

4031904.name: Ergoth's Jawbone
4031904.desc: This is the lower jawbone taken from defeating Ergoth.

4031905.name: Pianus Scale
4031905.desc: This is a scale taken from the giant demonfish Pianus.

4031906.name: Balrog Claw
4031906.desc: This is a claw taken from either the Crimson Balrog or the Geist Balrog.

4031907.name: Tiger's Fang Forging Manual
4031907.desc: John Barricade's hastily drawn notes for creating a Tiger's Fang.

4031908.name: Neva Forging Manual
4031908.desc: John Barricade's hastily drawn notes for creating a Neva.

4031909.name: Winkel Forging Manual
4031909.desc: John Barricade's hastily drawn notes for creating a Winkel.

4031910.name: Glitter Gloves Forging Manual
4031910.desc: John Barricade's hastily drawn notes for creating a pair of Glitter Gloves.

4031911.name: Facestompers Forging Manual
4031911.desc: John Barricade's hastily drawn notes for creating a pair of Facestompers.

4031912.name: Crystal Ilbi Forging Manual
4031912.desc: John Barricade's hastily drawn notes for creating a Crystal Ilbi.

4031913.name: Stone Tiger Head
4031913.desc: The figure of a roaring tiger's head, carved from an unknown material.

4031914.name: Typhon Crest
4031914.desc: A crest marked with the sign of Typhon, a wind beast.

4031915.name: LeFay Jewel
4031915.desc: A jewel from the former headpiece worn by the dark sorceress LeFay.

4031916.name: Pharoah's Wrappings
4031916.desc: The remnant of an ancient king's burial garb, probably found from a Nihalian tomb.

4031917.name: Crystal Shard
4031917.desc: A shard from a legendary crystal sword shattered when used to slay a powerful demon.

4031918.name: Ancient Faceguard
4031918.desc: An ancient, broken version of the Bosshunter Faceguard that has lost its original power.  With a magic ritual and the right spell components, this can be restored to its original, equippable condition.

4031919.name: Ancient Gi
4031919.desc: An ancient, broken version of the Bosshunter Gi that has lost its original power.  With a magic ritual and the right spell components, this can be restored to its original, equippable condition.

4031920.name: Ancient Boots
4031920.desc: An ancient, broken version of the Bosshunter Boots that has lost its original power.  With a magic ritual and the right spell components, this can be restored to its original, equippable condition.

4031921.name: Hidden note
4031921.desc: In order to prove the worth as a pet trainer, you have to find this.

4031923.name: Radio Parts
4031923.desc: A radio part that can be used to fix Petit's radio.

4031924.name: Fairy Hair
4031924.desc: Some hair from a fairy with mysterious powers. Apparently, fairies give a piece of their hair to someone as a sign of apology.

4031925.name: Cursing Nail
4031925.desc: A nail used for curse. Make a voodoo doll, press this nail against it, and the curse is on!

4031926.name: Gray Tentacle
4031926.desc: A tentacle from Gray's head. Apparently Grays use this tentacle to communicate, instead of their mouths.

4031927.name: Wave Translator
4031927.desc: A wave translator invented by Dr. Kim of Omega Sector to translate supersonic waves Grays use to communicate to one another. May be subject to malfunction.

4031928.name: Wave Translator
4031928.desc: A wave translator invented by Dr. Kim of Omega Sector to translate supersonic waves Grays use to communicate to one another. May be subject to malfunction.

4031933.name: Solid Purple Lumber
4031933.desc: A solid, purple lumber. Can be used to build things.

4031934.name: Solid Pink Lumber
4031934.desc: A solid, pink lumber. Can be used to build things.

4031935.name: Solid Yellow Lumber
4031935.desc: A solid, yellow lumber. Can be used to build things.

4031936.name: Taru Spirit Feather
4031936.desc: A special feather given to a Taru warrior to mark a brave deed. [This item is required to upgrade Taru weapons.]

4031937.name: Jungle Lily
4031937.desc: A rare, exotic flower that grows in the Krakian Jungle.

4031938.name: 99% Dark Chocolate
4031938.desc: A 99% Cacao dark chocolate that tastes like crayon. It's so bitter, some call it a tearjerker.

4031939.name: 99% Dark Chocolate
4031939.desc: A 99% Cacao dark chocolate that tastes like crayon. It's so bitter, some call it a tearjerker.

4031940.name: 99% Dark Chocolate
4031940.desc: A 99% Cacao dark chocolate that tastes like crayon. It's so bitter, some call it a tearjerker.

4031942.name: Mallet
4031942.desc: An important tool needed to awaken Krexel.

4031945.name: Mysterious Cloth
4031945.desc: A mysterious cloth created by Arwen using Snow Silk. It's transparent and sparkly, but also very tightly woven.

4031963.name: Eel's Half Pendant
4031963.desc: A pendant that Eels carries with, with a broken jewel on the pendant.

4031964.name: Piece of Pendant
4031964.desc: The other half of Eels's necklace. A perfect tft it with Eels's pendant.

4031965.name: Eel's Pendant
4031965.desc: Eels's pendant that is finally seeing its original night of day. It looks like it might have some mysterious power in it.

Order : Keol

Usage : For Test

4031968.desc:

4031971.desc:

4031974.desc:

4031975.desc:

4031979.name: Doodly Paper
4031979.desc: A piece of paper with illegible doodling on it.\n#Mix gold and iron in the ratio of 6:2, then cover it with wisdom and courage stored in Lithium.# Then...

4031980.name: Gold Anvil
4031980.desc: An anvil that glows in gold.

4031988.name: Special Agent Badge
4031988.desc: Item Agent O asked me to retrieve.  I should take it back to Agent O.

4031991.name: Timer's Egg
4031991.desc: This is Timer's egg. It's too hard to crack. Ghosthunter Bob must know what to do with this.

4031992.name: Springy Worm
4031992.desc: This little worm lives in Ludirium. It's so small it's not at all threatening.

4031993.name: Bartos' Favorite Juice
4031993.desc: A savory juice that Bartos really likes to drink.

4031999.name: Master M's Direction Scroll
4031999.desc: Directions believed be written by Master M.

4032000.name: Master M's Order Scroll
4032000.desc: An order believed to be written by Master M.

4032001.name: Master M's Command Scroll
4032001.desc: A command believed to be written by Master M.

4032002.name: Marble of Chaos
4032002.desc: This marble was created by Temple Keeper. It can break the barrier with the chaotic power within.

4032003.name: Phantom Seed
4032003.desc: A seed dropped by the possessed trees of Phantom Forest.

4032004.name: Crimson Wood
4032004.desc: Resilient wood from the Crimson Tree.

4032005.name: Typhon Feather
4032005.desc: A feather from the mythical Typhon.  These are thought to contain the essence of their wind nature.

4032006.name: Stormbreaker Badge
4032006.desc: An emblem that marks one as a member of the Stormbreakers.

4032007.name: Windraider Badge
4032007.desc: An emblem that marks one as a member of the Windraiders.

4032008.name: Firebrand Badge
4032008.desc: An emblem that marks one as a member of the Firebrands.

4032009.name: Nightshadow Badge
4032009.desc: An emblem that marks one as a member of the Nightshadows.

4032010.name: Elder Ashes
4032010.desc: The Elder Wraiths are spirits of Crimsonwood Keep heroes who fell in battle but were never buried.  These are the burnt ashes of their remains (ashes of the dead) and should basically look like a pile of grey dust.

4032011.name: Soiled Rags
4032011.desc: The Elder Wraiths are spirits of Crimsonwood Keep heroes who fell in battle but were never buried.  These are the burnt ashes of their remains (ashes of the dead) and should basically look like a pile of grey dust.

4032012.name: Crimson Heart
4032012.desc: A dark red crystal that pulses with unknown energy, used to power the Crimson Guardians.

4032013.name: Bigfoot's Toe
4032013.desc: The big toe of Bigfoot.  Even though it has a pretty ribbon tied around it, it still looks kinda gross.

4032014.name: Jack's Letter to John
4032014.desc: A letter the Jack has written to John.  It seems to be written in some secret code known only between the Barricade Brothers.

4032015.name: Tao of Shadows
4032015.desc: A ancient Shadowknight artifact.  Its use is known only to the Raven Ninjas.

4032016.name: Tao of Sight
4032016.desc: A ancient Shadowknight artifact.  Its use is known only to the Raven Ninjas.

4032017.name: Tao of Harmony
4032017.desc: A ancient Shadowknight artifact.  Its use is known only to the Raven Ninjas.

4032021.name: Triferium Fuel Cell
4032021.desc: A futuristic, super-efficient power unit designed for everything from cybernetic protectors to microwaves.

4032022.name: Diferium Fuel Cell
4032022.desc: A futuristic power unit suitable for powering everything from toasters to toy robot dogs.

4032023.name: Sparkplug
4032023.desc: A useful component for many electronic devices, especially cybernetic protectors.

4032024.name: Jumper Cable
4032024.desc: A pair of jumper cables.  Anyone need a start?

4032025.name: T-1 Socket Adapter
4032025.desc: Looks like a socket adapter for the T-1 line of robotic devices.

4032026.name: Ridley's Stone
4032026.desc: An ancient magical stone bearing the mark of Ridley, the master artisan-magician.  It hums when in vicinity of a Ridley's Statue.

4032027.name: Coat Hanger
4032027.desc: A wire coat hanger that can be bent into different shapes, for function or for fun.

4032028.name: Wad of Gum
4032028.desc: A wad of gum that has been slightly chewed.  Still sticky!

4032029.name: Duct Tape
4032029.desc: A roll of silver duct tape.  Never know when this may come in handy!

4032030.name: Stretchy Material
4032030.desc: A piece of highly stretchy, elastic cloth.

4032031.name: Lucky Charm
4032031.desc: A small silver lucky charm.  Hopefully, it'll bring you more luck than it did the leprechaun.

4032033.name: Entrance pass for tomato farm 1
4032033.desc: It's a pass for the strange tomato farm. Talk to Ben to enter the inside of tomato farm.

4032034.name: Entrance pass for tomato farm 2
4032034.desc: It's a pass for the strange tomato farm. Talk to Ben to enter the inside of tomato farm.

4032035.name: A Lost Snipe
4032035.desc: A Snipe that has lost her way. Take her and move up to a high point, where she can use the launch pad-like area to try to fly her way back home.

4032036.name: Special Ticket to the Moon
4032036.desc: As long as you have this with you, the Moon Bunny will give you the Sweet Rice Cake 5 times a day.

4032037.name: Beef Slice
4032037.desc: A single slice of beef. Marinate it, then grill it to try to make the Fire Grill Skewer.

4032038.name: Dry Mushroom
4032038.desc: A single slice of dried mushroom. Mix it with some seasoning to make a Fire Grill Skewer.

4032039.name: Whole Bellflower
4032039.desc: A whole bellflower that can be used as part of the Fire Grill Skewer if soaked in salt water

4032040.name: Fire Grill Skewer Dish
4032040.desc: Simply a Fire Grill Skewer placed on a pretty dish. Nothing says Thank You quite like a nice dish of Fire Grill Skewer.

4032041.name: Moon Flower
4032041.desc: A beautiful flower that apparently only grows on the moon. Constantly glitters, thanks to all that moonlight it's been soaking up.

4032042.name: 1st Moon Photo Piece
4032042.desc: The first piece of photo of the moon. Collect the other two, and it'll turn into a photo of a beautiful full moon. Place the pictures inside the envelope to make sure they don't rip.

4032043.name: 2nd Moon Photo Piece
4032043.desc: The second piece of photo of the moon. Collect the other two, and it'll turn into a photo of a beautiful full moon. Place the pictures inside the envelope to make sure they don't rip.

4032044.name: 3rd Moon Photo Piece
4032044.desc: The third piece of photo of the moon. Collect the other two, and it'll turn into a photo of a beautiful full moon. Place the pictures inside the envelope to make sure they don't rip.

4032055.name: Event Ticket (Regular)
4032055.desc: A ticket that's required to enter the Mini Dungeon during the event period. Without this, you won't be able to fully participate in the event.

4032056.name: Magic Crystal
4032056.desc: A beautiful crystal with a red maple leaf inside. Hand this in to the Event Personnel, and she'll exchange this with a prize.

4032057.name: Attendance Sheet
4032057.desc: An attendance sheet that checks your daily attendance to MapleStory.

4032058.name: PB & J Sandwich
4032058.desc: A scrumptious Peanut Butter and Jelly Sandwich. The staple of lunch for all ages!

4032059.name: Chocolate Milk
4032059.desc: Rich Happyville chocolate combined with high-quality milk straight from the fields of Henesys. A delicious treat!

4032060.name: Chips
4032060.desc: An irresistible snack. Way too tasty to eat just one!

4032061.name: Cookie
4032061.desc: A chocolate chip cookie found in the wild, now prepared to eat. Guaranteed to bring a smile to someone's face.

4032062.name: Fruit Roll Up
4032062.desc: A favorite in Victoria Island, this delectable snack bursts with the taste of strawberries.

4032063.name: Notebook
4032063.desc: A special notebook used for the 2008 Back to School Event. Can be turned into the Maple Admin. May the best server team win!

4032066.name: Baby Bird Feather
4032066.desc: A soft feather presumably from a baby bird. Gaga will definitely like this.

4032084.name: Sophilia's Perfect Doll
4032084.desc: A perfect Sophilia Doll made by Jonas

4032085.name: Peto Doll
4032085.desc: A doll that has the ability to transform into Peto.

4032086.name: Mysterious Small Egg
4032086.desc: A Fairy with a luscious purple hair said something that's hard to understand, then left a mysterious, small egg in the pocket. Can't figure out what this egg really is, but the Fairy may help identify the egg.

4032087.name: Lucky White Monkey Doll
4032087.desc: A white monkey doll that is considered a lucky charm. Whether it really brings good luck remains to be seen.

4032091.name: A Secret Note
4032091.desc: A secret note writen by Snow Spirit of Happyville for Alcaster.

4032092.name: Force of the Spirit
4032092.desc: A magical item that contains the magic force of the Snow Spirit. Apparently it contains mystical magic...

4032093.name: Alcaster's Reply
4032093.desc: A reply letter written by Alcaster of El Nath for Snow Spirit.

4032094.name: Snow Vigor
4032094.desc: A magical vigor of snow that provides much-needed support to the snowman. Drop this item on the snowman and magical things may happen.

4032095.name: Fake Snow Vigor
4032095.desc: A magical vigor of snow that provides much-needed support to the snowman. Drop this item on the snowman and magical things may happen.

4032096.name: Proof of Exam
4032096.desc: The Proof of Exam used for the Knighthood Exam. Take it over to Mihile, and you will be acknowledged as a legitimate knight.

4032097.name: Proof of Exam
4032097.desc: The Proof of Exam used for the Knighthood Exam. Take it over to Oz, and you will be acknowledged as a legitimate knight.

4032098.name: Proof of Exam
4032098.desc: The Proof of Exam used for the Knighthood Exam. Take it over to Irena, and you will be acknowledged as a legitimate knight.

4032099.name: Proof of Exam
4032099.desc: The Proof of Exam used for the Knighthood Exam. Take it over to Eckhart, and you will be acknowledged as a legitimate knight.

4032100.name: Proof of Exam
4032100.desc: The Proof of Exam used for the Knighthood Exam. Take it over to Hawkeye, and you will be acknowledged as a legitimate knight.

4032101.name: The Lost Treasure
4032101.desc: The lost treasure that was stolen by the Master of Disguise who brazenly entered Ereve. Let's take it back to Mihile.

4032102.name: The Lost Treasure
4032102.desc: The lost treasure that was stolen by the Master of Disguise who brazenly entered Ereve. Let's take it back to Oz.

4032103.name: The Lost Treasure
4032103.desc: The lost treasure that was stolen by the Master of Disguise who brazenly entered Ereve. Let's take it back to Irena.

4032104.name: The Lost Treasure
4032104.desc: The lost treasure that was stolen by the Master of Disguise who brazenly entered Ereve. Let's take it back to Eckhart.

4032105.name: The Lost Treasure
4032105.desc: The lost treasure that was stolen by the Master of Disguise who brazenly entered Ereve. Let's take it back to Hawkeye.

4032115.name: Neinheart's Letter
4032115.desc: A letter of introduction from Neinheart. Hand this to Kiridu the Mount Trainer, and you'll learn to ride a Mount available exclusively to the knights.

4032116.name: Kiridu's Letter

4032480.name: Stanlica's Guitar

4032484.name: Kyrinvana's Guitar

4032488.name: Ayan Mercury's Microphone
4032488.desc: I will love my life just as I love the melody of this song.(Use it on the dirty Treasure Map.)\r\n#c- Ayan -#

When trading to another player, a tax fee of 30 million mesos per Billion Meso Coin will be deducted automatically from your inventory. #cThis item cannot be dropped.# #cThis item cannot be sold in a personal store/merchant.

4161012.desc: A diligent traveler in MapleStory can now prove his/her diligence in traveling through this attendance book. \n#cDouble-click on the item to open the book.#

4161013.name: Leafre Guidebook
4161013.desc: A book that details different ways to get to Leafre in Ossyria. \n#cDouble-click on the item to open the book.#

4161014.name: Diary of the Goddess
4161014.desc: This diary is written by Minerva the Goddess.\n#cDouble-click on the item to read the book.#

4161015.name: [Storybook] Burning Book of Fire
4161015.desc: A book with a flaming cover. There's nothing written inside. Perhaps Bishop Gritto can help?\nJob : #cArch Mage (Fire/Poison)#

4161016.name: [Storybook] Frozen Book of Ice
4161016.desc: A book with frozen ice on its cover. There's nothing written inside.  Perhaps Bishop Gritto can help?\nJob : #cArch Mage (Ice/Lightning)#

4161017.name: Caron's Note
4161017.desc: A black notebook with no title or whatsoever. Some of the notes inside were taken by Caron, the sailor sailiing through the River of Death

4161018.name: [Storybook] Ancient Book
4161018.desc: A strange, blank book with neither a title nor anything written inside it.  Wiz the librarian might know something about this book.\nOnly for :#c4th Job Bowman#

4161019.name: Sayram's Journey
4161019.desc: A book that chronicles the various adventures of Sayram, a legendary Warrior.

4161020.name: Story of a Magician
4161020.desc: A book that chronicles the life of a magician who, despite showing signs of pure genius, managed to fall in love with banned magic and became a mad magician.

4161021.name: [Storybook] Formula for Black Cloud
4161021.desc: A book that features the blueprint on the device that creates black clouds, as well as the step-by-step guide to using the device.\nJob : #cShadower#

4161022.name: Burning Book of Fire
4161022.desc: A book with a flaming cover. Inside, the book features texts on fire magic, as well as some undiscipherable phrases.

4161023.name: Frozen Book of Ice
4161023.desc: A book with frozen ice on its cover. Inside, the book features texts on ice magic, as well as some undiscipherable phrases.

4161024.name: Bowman's Way
4161024.desc: A bible for bowmen. It details the way bowmen train, as well as insights on 'Bowman Training Ground'.

4161025.name: Road of Bowman
4161025.desc: This is a training guideline book for Bowman. It contains how to train Bowman and the story of training field.

4161026.desc: This is a training guideline book for Bowman. It contains how to train Bowman and the story of training field.

4161030.name: Book on Herbal Medicine
4161030.desc: This book contains formulas of various medicines created by Mr. Do, some more outrageous and questionable than others. If in possession of this book, Mr. Do will create those medicines.

4161031.name: Dran's Note
4161031.desc: A book written by the missing alchemist, Dran, on his studies. Looking into the book, it doesn't resemble study notes as much as a diary.

4161032.name: Dran's Note
4161032.desc: A book written by the missing alchemist, Dran, on his studies. Looking into the book, it doesn't resemble study notes as much as a diary.

4161035.name: The Legend of Snail
4161035.desc: A book chronicling the history of snails, the creature with the longest life span in Maple World.

4161036.name: Song : Twinkle Twinkle Little Star
4161036.desc: A book that contains the notes to play beautiful music. This book has the notes of Twinkle Twinkle Little Star.

4161037.name: A Guide to Using the Maker Skill
4161037.desc: [Maker] A manual to explain a skill use.

4161038.name: Santa Encyclopedia No.2
4161038.desc: Santa Encyclopedia that contains the history of Santa's Family.\n#cDouble click on the item to open the book.

4161039.name: Santa Encyclopedia No.3
4161039.desc: Santa Encyclopedia that contains method about how to make the Christmas Socks.\n#cDouble click on the item to open the book.

4161040.name: Santa Encyclopedia No.4
4161040.desc: Santa Encyclopedia that contains characteristics of Santa.\n#cDouble click on the item to open the book.

4161041.name: Santa Encyclopedia No.5
4161041.desc: Santa Encyclopedia that contains how to do a good thing for Christmas.\n#cDouble click on the item to open the book.

4161042.name: Santa Encyclopedia No.6
4161042.desc: Santa Encyclopedia that explains about the Santa village of Finland.\n#cDouble click on the item to open the book.

4161043.name: Santa Encyclopedia No.1
4161043.desc: Santa Encyclopedia that contains the history of Santa.\n#cDouble click on the item to open the book.

4161044.name: Cygnus Knight's Book Volume 1
4161044.desc: A recording of the conversation I had with the book containing Cygnus' thoughts.

4161045.name: Cygnus Knight's Book Volume 2
4161045.desc: A recording of the conversation I had with the book containing Cygnus' thoughts.

4161046.name: Cygnus Knight's Book Volume 3
4161046.desc: A recording of the conversation I had with the book containing Cygnus' thoughts.

4161047.name: Noblesse Guide
4161047.desc: A guide for Noblesses.\n#cThe book can be opened by double-clicking on it.#

4161048.name: Legend's Guide
4161048.desc: A guide strictly for the Legends. \n#cDouble-click the item to open.#

4161049.name: Dragon Types and Characteristics (Vol.I)
4161049.desc: A book that describes the different types of dragons and their characteristics. It appears that there is a second volume as well. \n#cDouble-click to open the book#

4161050.name: Dragon Types and Characteristics (Vol.II)
4161050.desc: A book that describes the different types of dragons and their characteristics. It appears that there is a first volume as well. \n#cDouble-click to open the book#

4161051.name: Crew Member's Voyage Log
4161051.desc: A Voyage Log written by a Crew Member. It's said to contain information about dragons... \n#cYou can open the book by double-clicking it.#

4161052.name: Evan Guide
4161052.desc: A guide for Evan. \n#cYou can open the book by double-clicking on it.#

4161053.name: Puzzle King Guide
4161053.desc: A guide that has the information on how to obtain the 7th Anniversary Puzzle Pieces. Read this book and you can be a Puzzle King too!

4161079.name: Mercedes Guide
4161079.desc: A guide for Mercedes. \n#cDouble-click to open it.#

4161080.name: Aria's Diary
4161080.desc: Part of a diary written by Aria. It's full of personal things, but has been damaged to the point that there are only few sections that you can actually read.\n#cDouble-click on the item to open the book.#

4161081.name: Mesoranger Action Guide
4161081.desc: You, too, can become a Mesoranger! A guide that helps anyones with becoming a Mesoranger.

4162000.name: 7th Anniversary Diary
4162000.desc: A diary in which you can read all about the 7th Anniversary event. You can also see how close you are to earning a Joyous 7th Medal and your progress on the Rising Star mission. \n#cDouble-click to read.#

4162001.name: Chivalry Log
4162001.desc: A book which can be used to check event paricipation status.\r\n#cDouble-click on it to check your participation, as well as rewards.#

4162002.name: Tasty Watermelon Farming Journal
4162002.desc: A farming journal in which you can check the number days spent cultivating Tasty Watermelons.\r\n#cDouble-click on it to check your progress.#

4162003.name: Secret Heat-Beating Recipe
4162003.desc: A secret recipe book in which you can check your progress in Special Fruit Sundae crafting.\r\n#cDouble-click on it to check your participation status and rewards.#

4162004.name: Pirate Treasure Map Book
4162004.desc: A collection of pirate treasure maps.\r\n#cDouble-click on it to check your participation status and rewards.#

4162005.name: Monkey Doll Recovery Record
4162005.desc: A book which can be used to check how many Monkey Dolls you have recovered.\r\n#cDouble-click on it to check your recovery status and rewards.#

4162006.name: Legendary Fruit Juice Book
4162006.desc: A secret guide to making legendary fruit juices. This is just what you need to become a Legendary Fruit Juice Master! You can also record your juice-making triumphs in here.\r\n#cDouble-click on it to check your current juice-making record.#

4162007.name: Eco Mapleteer Strategy Journal
4162007.desc: A strategy journal that records all the activities of Eco Mapleteers. If you use the Going Green skill once a day, mark it down in this book.\r\n#cDouble-click on it to check your Eco Mapleteer activity record.#

4162008.name: Monster Mop-Up Journal
4162008.desc: A monster mop-up journal from the Administrator. You can receive a stamp in it once a day by defeating 200 monsters.\r\n#cDouble-click on it to check your monster mop-up record and rewards.#

4162009.name: Memory Journal
4162009.desc: Record your memories from Legends, and make them last forever! By receiving and completing a Making Memories event once a day, your memories will be automatically recorded. Double-click to check.

4162010.name: Mini Maple Tree Cultivation Journal
4162010.desc: A journal for recording your progress in cultivating the Mini Maple Tree.\r\n#cDouble-click on it to check your progress.#

4162011.name: Christmas Tree Journal
4162011.desc: A journal for recording your progress in growing your very own Christmas Tree. Click on it to open it.

4162012.name: Legends Awards Application
4162012.desc: An application you received from Gaga. Open it up to view a list of events you can partake in for awards.

4162013.name: Rock-Paper-Scissors Score Card
4162013.desc: A score card for recording your wins and losses from playing Gaga.

4162014.name: Training Journal
4162014.desc: A training journal that records up to 10 days.

4220149.name: Portrait of an Octopus

4220150.name: Portrait of a Yeti

4220151.name: Hanging Scroll
4220151.desc: A Hanging Scroll given to you by the Black Wing Shadow Warrior. The erased content can be restored by using special ink.\r\n#cCan be opened by double-clicking on it with a mouse.#

4220152.name: Rainbow Drawing
4220152.desc: A sheet of sketch paper that has a rainbow drawing.  \r\n#cYou can open it with your mouse by double-clicking.#

4220153.name: Dirty Treasure Map
4220153.desc: A treasure map given by Kyrin. There are three sections--red, green, and white--that are invisible. The green section should be cleaned first. \r\n\r\n*If you don't need the item anymore, just go to Jack in the Top Floor - Hallway to discard it.#

5021003.desc: A red starfish that can be found at the beach. Can be equipped and thrown in place of a #cthrowing star# to generate a starfish effect.

5021004.name: Winged Baseball
5021004.desc: A baseball with small wings attached to it. Can be equipped and thrown in place of a #cthrowing star# to generate a winged baseball effect.

5021005.name: Football
5021005.desc: The official football of the MapleBowl. Can be equipped and thrown in place of a #cthrowing star# to generate a thrown football effect.

5021006.name: Chalkboard Eraser
5021006.desc: A chalkboard eraser commonly found in classrooms. Can be equipped and thrown in place of a #cthrowing star# to generate an eraser effect.

5021007.name: Shooting Hearts
5021007.desc: A small pink heart of love that explodes on contact. Can be equipped and thrown in place of a #cthrowing star# to generate a heart effect.

5021008.name: Throwing Teddy
5021008.desc: An adorable brown teddy bear that explodes on contact. Can be equipped and thrown in place of a #cthrowing star# to generate a teddy bear effect.

5021009.name: Throwing Pepe
5021009.desc: Never in Pepe's wildest dreams did it think it'd be chucked down the field in place of the throwing star. Can be equipped and thrown in place of a #cthrowing star# to generate the Pepe effect.

5021010.name: Mr. Puff Throwing Star
5021010.desc: A throwing star make to look like Mr. Puff, with its huffy puffy cheeks resembling that of a tasty-looking steamed bun. Can be equipped and thrown in place of a #cthrowing star# to generate the Mr. Puff effect.

5021011.name: Skull Striker
5021011.desc: An enchanted skull straight from the Headless Horseman. Can be equipped and thrown in place of a #cthrowing star# to generate the skull striker effect.

5021012.name: Pumpkin Bomb
5021012.desc: Harmless pie? Think again. Can be equipped and thrown in place of a #cthrowing star# to generate a pumpkin bomb effect.

5021013.name: Pirate Bomb
5021013.desc: An explosive bomb used by legendary pirates. Can be equipped and thrown in place of a #cthrowing star# to generate an explosive bomb effect.

5021014.name: Poo Stars
5021014.desc: That nasty poo can be detected from afar. Can be equipped and thrown in place of a #cthrowing star# to generate a nasty poo effect.

5021015.name: Egg Throwing Star
5021015.desc: A white egg thrown in place of the throwing star, that explodes on contact. Can be equipped and thrown in place of a #cthrowing star# to generate the Chick effect.

5021016.name: Devilball
5021016.desc: A mischievous ball that has gained sentience, and now lives to be thrown for massive damage. Tremendous striking power! Can be equipped and thrown in place of a #cthrowing star#.

5021017.name: Dragon Disc
5021017.desc: An explosive throwing star used by the Dragon. Can be equipped and thrown in place of a #cthrowing star# to generate an explosive bomb effect.

5021019.name: Shooting Star Medal
5021019.desc: A beautiful star. Can be equipped and thrown in place of a #cthrowing star# to generate a shooting star effect.

5021020.name: Throwing Boomers
5021020.desc: Explosive throwing stars from New Leaf City. They're the Bomb! Can be equipped and thrown in place of a #cthrowing star# to generate a Boomer explosion effect.

5021021.name: Exploding Sheep
5021021.desc: A cute and cuddly sheep. Don't let it fool you--it's lethal. Can be equipped and thrown in place of a #cthrowing star# to generate a sheep explosion effect.

5021022.name: Plate Throwing Star
5021022.desc: Hurl ceramic plates at the bad guys! Can be equipped and thrown in place of a #cthrowing star# to generate the dish breaking effect.

5021023.name: Stirge Throwing Star
5021023.desc: A favorite of the Stirgeman! Guaranteed to get you out of a tight spot! Can be equipped and thrown in place of a #cthrowing star# to generate the Stirge effect.

5021024.name: Throwing Eggs Weapon
5021024.desc: Throw eggs! Can be equipped and thrown in place of a #cthrowing star# to generate the egg splatter effect

5021025.name: Charm of the Undead
5021025.desc: The power of the Charm of the Undead is now in your hands! Can be equipped and thrown in place of a #cthrowing star# to generate the Charm of the Undead effect.

5021026.name: Gift Box Throwing Stars
5021026.desc: A gift box with Santa inside! Can be equipped and thrown in place of a #cthrowing star# to generate the exploding gift box effect.

5040000.name: The Teleport Rock
5040000.desc: Remembers 5 maps of your choice. This rock will enable you to #cteleport to the map you remembered#. It can even allow you to #cmove to the map where a certain character is#, provided that the person is in the same channel and the same world. This item cannot be used to teleport in between continents.

5040001.name: Teleport Coke
5040001.desc: By drinking sweet refreshing #cCoca-Cola#, it ables you to #cteleport to one of the remembered maps#. You can also #cteleport to the map where specific character is located# in the same channel. Unable the teleport to the maps where teleport is limited.

5041000.name: VIP Teleport Rock
5041000.desc: This Teleport Rock enables one to #cteleport between continents#. It also enables the user to teleport to a specific character from the same channel. Up to #c10# maps, excluding the maps that cannot be reached through teleport, can be registered for this.

5050000.name: AP Reset
5050000.desc: This is the #cscroll that allows you to reset 1 AP from the ability stat#. Choose one AP from HP, MP, STR, DEX, INT, or LUK , and allocate it to the desired category. The lowest an AP level can reach on any category is 4.

5050001.name: SP Reset (1st job)
5050001.desc: This scroll allows you to #creset 1 SP from a 1st-job skill#. The SP that's been reset may NOT be applied to 2nd, 3rd or 4th job skills.

5050002.name: SP Reset (2nd job)
5050002.desc: This scroll allows you to #creset 1 SP from a 2nd-level skill#. The 1st job SP raised AFTER the 2nd job adv. can also be reset and applied to a 2nd job skill. The SP that's been reset may NOT be applied to 1st, 3rd or 4th job skills.

5050003.name: SP Reset (3rd job)
5050003.desc: This scroll allows you to #creset 1 SP from a 3rd-level skill#. The 1st & 2nd job SP raised AFTER the 3rd job adv. can also be reset and applied to a 3rd job skill. The SP that's been reset may NOT be applied to 1st, 2nd or 4th job skills.

5050004.name: SP Reset (4th job)
5050004.desc: This scroll allows you to #creset 1 SP from a 4th-level skill#. The 1st, 2nd, and 3rd job SP raised AFTER the 4th job adv. can also be reset and applied to a 3rd job skill. The SP that's been reset may NOT be applied to 1st, 2nd or 3rd job skills.

5060000.name: Item Tag
5060000.desc: This will enable the owner of the weapon to engrave his/her name on an equipment item once. Click on the item, and drag the item #con top of the equipment of choice# to engrave your character's name on it.

5060001.name: Item Guard
5060001.desc: A lock that seals any equipment item and throwing star, excluding the quest items. By sealing the item away, the item will be #cdisabled from selling, trading, or throwing away#. Double-click on the lock to seal an item.

5060002.name: Incubator
5060002.desc: An equipment needed to open the #ceggs from pigme#. Pigme eggs can be incubated by double clicking the incubator.

5061000.name: Item Guard : 7 Days
5061000.desc: A guard for sealing an equip item and/or throwing star to prevent #cselling, trading or dropping# of the item. Double-click on the guard, then seal the item into the window that appears. #cThis Item Guard is active for 7 days, after which the item will be automatically released from the seal.#

5061001.name: Item Guard : 30 Days
5061001.desc: A guard for sealing an equip item and/or throwing star to prevent #cselling, trading or dropping# of the item. Double-click on the guard, then seal the item into the window that appears. #cThis Item Guard is active for 30 days, after which the item will be automatically released from the seal.#

5061002.name: Item Guard : 90 days
5061002.desc: A guard for sealing an equip item and/or throwing star to prevent #cselling, trading or dropping# of the item. Double-click on the guard, then seal the item into the window that appears. #cThis Item Guard is active for 90 days, after which the item will be automatically released from the seal.#

5061003.name: Item Guard : 365 Days
5061003.desc: A guard for sealing an equip item and/or throwing star to prevent #cselling, trading or dropping# of the item. Double-click on the guard, then seal the item into the window that appears. #cThis Item Guard is active for 365 days, after which the item will be automatically released from the seal.#

5075000.name: MapleTV Messenger
5075000.desc: Show your avatar on Maple TV with messages.\nIn case of dedication messages, character you have designated will also appear on the screen throughout the entire world. The message will last appx. 15 seconds.

5075001.name: MapleTV Star Messenger
5075001.desc: Beautifully designed TV with star effects. \nThis allows you to type in longer messages with longer period of time, 30 seconds.  Only announcement type of message is available with this item.  The message will last for 30 seconds.

5075002.name: MapleTV Heart Messenger
5075002.desc: Beautifully designed TV with Heart effect.\nPropose in style on the TV.  This item only allows dedication type of message where designated user also appears on the TV.  The message will last for 1 minute.

5075003.name: Megassenger
5075003.desc: Show your message on the chatting window as well as Maple TV at the same time.

5075004.name: Star Megassenger

5075005.name: Heart Megassenger

5077000.name: Triple Megaphone

5170000.name: Pet Name Tag
5170000.desc: Use this item to name your pet. Call its name before making an order, and the pet responds much better to your command. \n ex) Lucky, sit!

5180000.name: Water of Life
5180000.desc: A mysterious water gathered from the deepest valleys of Ellinia. Double click the Water of Life to reawaken your pet, which has turned into a doll.

5190000.name: Item Pick-up Skill
5190000.desc: Adds the item pick-up skill to a pet. \n#cAvailable to pets that can only pick up Mesos.#

5190001.name: HP Charge Skill
5190001.desc: Adds the automatic potion-feeding skill to the pet. \n#cAvailable to all pets that do not have this option.#

5190002.name: Expand Range Skill
5190002.desc: Use this scroll to expand the pet's moving range by 3 times. \n#cOnly available to pets that have automatic pick-up skills, cannot be used on top of each other.#

5190003.name: Automatic Pick-Up Skill
5190003.desc: A skill that enables pets to pick up items and mesos within the area without the character having to move. \n#cAvailable to pets with Mesos pick-up, item pick-up skills.#

5190004.name: (+) Pick up Leftover Item & Meso Skills
5190004.desc: Adds the skill that enables pets to pick up mesos and items that have been dropped for more than 30 seconds, thus rendering it as leftovers.\n#cAvailable to pets that have Meso pick-up skills as well as item pick-up skills.#

5190005.name: Unpickable item skill
5190005.desc: The skill that makes the pet not pick up selected item. \n#s only pet mounted meso or item collecting function can use the skill.#

5190006.name: MP potion recharge skill
5190006.desc: The skill that automatically recharges one's MP provided you have set the option up in the system option. \n#c The skill applies to all pet that does not have the skillt#.

5191000.name: (-) Delete Item Pick-Up
5191000.desc: Use this scroll to disable the pet from picking up items.

5191001.name: (-) Delete HP Charge
5191001.desc: Use this scroll to disable the pet from automatically feeding the character when the HP reaches critical stage.

5191002.name: (-)Delete Expand Range
5191002.desc: Use this scroll to return the range of pet's movement back to normal.

5191003.name: (-) Delete Automatic Pick-Up
5191003.desc: Use this scroll to disable the pet from picking up items and mesos.

5191004.name: (-) Delete Pick up Leftover Item & Meso
5191004.desc: Use this scroll to disable pets from picking up leftover items and mesos, the ones that have been dropped for more than 30 seconds.

5240312.name: Raw Fish

5251000.name: Wedding Ticket (Cathedral)
5251000.desc: Ticket to have a wedding at the Cathedral w/ invitations

5251001.name: Wedding Ticket (Chapel)

5251002.name: Premium Wedding Ticket (Chapel)
5251002.desc: Chapel wedding ticket that includes invitations and a special wedding event.

5251003.desc: Cathedral wedding ticket that includes invitations and a special wedding event.

5251004.name: Simple Wedding Ticket
5251004.desc: A ticket that allows for a simple wedding. #cThe bride and groom may each invite 5 well-wishers and receive a 1 Carat Wedding Ring.#

5251005.name: Sweet Wedding Ticket
5251005.desc: A ticket that allows for a sweet wedding. #cThe bride and groom may each invite 15 well-wishers, take a Wedding Photo, and receive a 2 Carat Wedding Ring.#

5251006.name: Premium Wedding Ticket
5251006.desc: A ticket that allows for a lavish, premier wedding. #cThe bride and groom may each invite 30 well-wishers, take a Wedding Photo, and receive a 3 Carat Wedding Ring.#

5251100.name: Wedding Invitation Ticket
5251100.desc: Ticket that lets you make additional invitation cards.(one-time use)

5252000.name: Event Ticket (NX)
5252000.desc: A ticket that's required to enter the Mini Dungeon during the event period. Without this, you won't be able to fully participate in the event.

5252001.name: Ticket to Treasure Dungeon
5252001.desc: This ticket allows you to enter the Treasure Dungeon.

5281000.name: Passed Gas
5281000.desc: A special effect that shows Passed Gas. Double-click to use this effect one time only!

5281001.name: Floral Scent
5281001.desc: A special effect that shows Floral Scent.\nDouble-click on the icon or designate a HotKey to turn the effect on/off.

5300000.name: Fungus Scroll
5300000.desc: At last, your desire to transform into a mushroom can be fulfilled. Disguise yourself for 10 minutes and surpirse your friends!

5300001.name: Oinker Delight
5300001.desc: Endulge yourself with this phat pig costume. 10 minutes of gluttony has never been so fun!

5300002.name: Zeta Nightmare
5300002.desc: Become a terifying Space Monster with this costume. Scare your friends out of this world for 10 minutes!

5330000.name: Quick Delivery Ticket
5330000.desc: This ticket enables one to send a package, along with an entered message, #cRIGHT THEN AND THERE#. #cDouble-click# it or visit the #cPackage NPC# to use this.

5360000.name: 1day 2x Drop Special Coupon
5360000.desc: This coupon #cdoubles the amount of mesos and doubles the rate of items# dropped from monsters. The Double Drop card is immediately activated upon purchase and the double drop effect will be available for 24 hours upon purchase.

5360001.name: 2x Drop Card Type 1 - Everyday
5360001.desc: This coupon #cdoubles the amount of mesos and doubles the rate of items# dropped from monsters. The Double Drop card is immediately activated upon purchase and the double drop effect will be available from 07 am to 11 am (Pacific time) #ceveryday#.

5360002.desc: This coupon #cdoubles the amount of mesos and doubles the rate of items# dropped from monsters. The Double Drop card is immediately activated upon purchase and the double drop effect will be available from 10 am to 02 pm (Pacific time) #ceveryday#.

5360003.desc: This coupon #cdoubles the amount of mesos and doubles the rate of items# dropped from monsters. The Double Drop card is immediately activated upon purchase and the double drop effect will be available from 01 pm to 05 pm (Pacific time) #ceveryday#.

5360004.name: 2x Drop Card Type 4 - Everyday
5360004.desc: This coupon #cdoubles the amount of mesos and doubles the rate of items# dropped from monsters. The Double Drop card is immediately activated upon purchase and the double drop effect will be available from 04 pm to 08 pm (Pacific time) #ceveryday#.

5360005.name: 2x Drop Card Type 5 - Everyday
5360005.desc: This coupon #cdoubles the amount of mesos and doubles the rate of items# dropped from monsters. The Double Drop card is immediately activated upon purchase and the double drop effect will be available from 07 pm to 11 pm (Pacific time) #ceveryday#.

5360006.desc: This coupon #cdoubles the amount of mesos and doubles the rate of items# dropped from monsters. The Double Drop card is immediately activated upon purchase and the double drop effect will be available from 12 am to 04 am (Pacific time) #ceveryday#.

5360007.name: 2x Drop Card Type 7 - Everyday
5360007.desc: This coupon #cdoubles the amount of mesos and doubles the rate of items# dropped from monsters. The Double Drop card is immediately activated upon purchase and the double drop effect will be available from 03 am to 07 am (Pacific time) #ceveryday#.

5360008.name: 2x Drop Card Type 8 - Everyday
5360008.desc: This coupon #cdoubles the amount of mesos and doubles the rate of items# dropped from monsters. The Double Drop card is immediately activated upon purchase and the double drop effect will be available from 06 am to 10 am (Pacific time) #ceveryday#.

5360009.name: 2X Drop Card - Type 1
5360009.desc: This coupon allows users to earn #c2x Exp (double experience)#. The coupon will be activated immediately after purchase, and the double experience effect will be available for 24 hours upon purchase.

5360010.desc: This coupon allows users to earn #c2x Exp (double experience)#. The coupon will be activated immediately after purchase, and the double experience effect will be available for 24 hours upon purchase.

5360011.desc: This coupon allows users to earn #c2x Exp (double experience)#. The coupon will be activated immediately after purchase, and the double experience effect will be available for 24 hours upon purchase.

5360042.name: 4 hour 2 x Drop special coupon
5360042.desc: This coupon #cdoubles the amount of mesos and doubles the rate of items# dropped from monsters. The coupon will be immediately activated after purchase and the double drop effect will be available for 4 hour upon purchase.

5370000.name: Chalkboard
5370000.desc: Any information entered will be featured on the chalkboard. The item can be used anywhere including #cFree Market Entrance# except for #cFree Market#.

5370001.name: Chalkboard
5370001.desc: Any information entered will be featured on the chalkboard. The item can be used anywhere including #cFree Market Entrance# except for #cFree Market#.

5380000.name: The Rock of Evolution
5380000.desc: A mysterious rock that enables baby Evolving Pets to grow into full-fledged adult Evolving Pets.

5390000.name: Diablo Messenger
5390000.desc: Shout to everyone in the world your character is on with this megaphone. Now available with your avatar on the top of everyone's screen! Comes with a burning background for your avatar.

5390001.name: Cloud 9 Messenger
5390001.desc: Shout to everyone in the world your character is on with this megaphone. Now available with your avatar on the top of everyone's screen! Comes with a bright background for your avatar.

5390002.name: Loveholic Messenger
5390002.desc: Shout to everyone in the world your character is on with this megaphone. Now available with your avatar on the top of everyone's screen! Comes with a heart background for your avatar.

5390004.name: Fortune Megaphone
5390004.desc: Use this item to broadcast your character spreading luck and a message to the entire world.

5390005.name: Cute Tiger Messenger
5390005.desc: Shout to everyone in the world your character is on with this megaphone. Now available with your avatar on the top of everyone's screen! Comes with a tiger background for your avatar.

5390006.name: Roaring Tiger Messenger
5390006.desc: Shout to everyone in the world your character is on with this megaphone. Now available with your avatar on the top of everyone's screen! Comes with a screen shake.

5390007.name: Goal! Messenger
5390007.desc: Shout to everyone in the world your character is on with this. Now available with your avatar on the top of everyone's screen!

5390011.name: Christmas Messenger
5390011.desc: Shout to everyone in the world your character is on with this megaphone. Now available with your avatar on the top of everyone’s screen! Comes with a festive background for your avatar.

5390012.name: Fireworks Messenger
5390012.desc: Shout to everyone in the world your character is on with this megaphone. Now available with your avatar on the top of everyone’s screen! Comes with an explosive background for your avatar

5391000.name: Winter Messenger
5391000.desc: Use this item to send a message to the whole world! It'll be seen with your character on a wintery background!

5400000.name: Character Name Change
5400000.desc: This scroll will enable you to change your character name to something totally new! Please be aware that the character must be at level 10 or higher to be eligible for the name change and the new name should be an acceptable new name that has passed the name check. The name-change will occur during the following server check, and you will then be restricted from changing names for one month.

5401000.name: Character Transfer
5401000.desc: This item is used to transfer your character from one game world server to another. Your character must be at least Level 20, and only up to 1,000,000 mesos will be transferred with the character.

5420000.name: Amoria Hair Membership Coupon
5420000.desc: Use it at #cAmoria Hair Salon# to change your hair to a style of #cyour choice#.

5420001.name: NLC Hair Membership Coupon
5420001.desc: Use it at #cNLC Hair Salon# to change your hair to a style of #cyour choice#.

5420002.name: Henesys Hair Membership Coupon
5420002.desc: Use it at #cHenesys Hair Salon# to change your hair to a style of #cyour choice#.

5420003.name: Kerning City Hair Membership Coupon
5420003.desc: Use it at #cKerning City Hair Salon# to change your hair to a style of #cyour choice#.

5420004.name: Orbis Hair Membership Coupon
5420004.desc: Use it at #cOrbis Hair Salon# to change your hair to a style of #cyour choice#.

5420005.name: Ludibrium Hair Membership Coupon
5420005.desc: Use it at #cLudibrium Hair Salon# to change your hair to a style of #cyour choice#.

5420006.name: Mu Lung Hair Membership Coupon
5420006.desc: Use it at #cMu Lung Hair Salon# to change your hair to a style of #cyour choice#.

5430000.name: Extra Character Slot Coupon
5430000.desc: Increases the character creation slot by 1. Each account may hold a maximum of 6 character slots per server world.

5431000.name: Maple Life (A-Type)
5431000.desc:
#c*Warning: If you do not have an empty Character slot, it cannot be used.#

If you are over #cLevel 30#, a new Level 30 character can be created in your world.You can choose one of the following classes #c(Warrior, Magician, Thief, Bowman and Pirate)# at #c1st Job status#.

Only the amount of AP needed for each respective 1st jobs have been allocated and the rest of AP and SP can be distributed to your liking.#cBasic equips and items# needed for travel are also provided.

5432000.name: Maple Life (B-Type)
5432000.desc:
#c*Warning : If all 12 character slots are full, it cannot be used.#

This package has the #cMaple Life item plus an Extra Character Slot coupon.#Using this item will automiatically create a new slot.

If you are over #cLevel 30#, a new Level 30 character can be created in your world. You can choose one of the following classes #c(Warrior, Magician, Thief, Bowman and Pirate)# at #c1st Job status.#

Only the amount of AP needed for each respective 1st jobs have been allocated and the rest of AP and SP can be distributed to your liking.#cBasic equips and items# needed for travel are also provided.

5450000.name: Miu Miu the Traveling Merchant
5450000.desc: Use this to experience the same effect as entering a general store. Can purchase potions to recover HP & MP, throwing stars, and recharge bullets. Some maps restrict the use of this item, though.

5451000.name: Remote Gachapon Ticket
5451000.desc: This ticket will enable you to use the Gachapon of any town without having to travel to the actual location.

5460000.name: Pet Snack
5460000.desc: This Pet Snack holds the secret method of handling multiple pets at once.

5470000.name: Store Remote Controller
5470000.desc: Can control the Hired Merchant anywhere, as long as the merchant is on the same channel.

5490000.name: Gold Master Key
5490000.desc: Take this Master Key to open the Gold Gachapon Box and earn a rare item!

5490001.name: Silver Master Key
5490001.desc: Take this Master Key to open the Silver Gachapon Box and earn a rare item!

5490002.name: Premium Gold Master Key
5490002.desc: Take this Premium Master Key to open the Premium Gold Box and earn a rare item!

5490003.name: Premium Silver Master Key
5490003.desc: Take this Premium Master Key to open the Premium Silver Box and earn a rare item!

5500000.name: 마법의 모래시계
5500000.desc: 장착 중인 유효기간이 있는 장비에 주문서처럼 드래그앤 드롭하여 사용하면, 유효기간이 #c1일#  늘어나게 된다. #c캐시아이템에는 사용할 수 없으며. 오늘부터 30일 이상으로는 늘릴 수 없다#

5500001.name: [7days]Magical Sandglass
5500001.desc: Drag and drop this onto a piece of equipment that has a time limit to extend the time limit by #c7days#. #This cannot be used on cash items, and the time limit cannot be extended past 30 days, starting from today.#

5500002.name: [20days]Magical Sandglass
5500002.desc: Drag and drop this onto a piece of equipment that has a time limit to extend the time limit by #c20days#. #This cannot be used on cash items, and the time limit cannot be extended past 30 days, starting from today.#

5510000.name: Wheel of Destiny
5510000.desc: This item revives characters in the same map where they have died. However, it cannot be used in some PQs, Event Maps, and Transportation (i.e. ship).

5520000.name: Scissors of Karma
5520000.desc: This cuts the ties that bind an item to its master, allowing you to trade once. Applicable to only certain items.

5530000.name: DS Egg Basket
5530000.desc: Double-click on it to exchange it with DS Eggs.

5550000.name: Increasing the Pendant Slots:30 Days
5550000.desc: This item allows characters to equip 1 more Pendant than is normally allowed for 30 days. #cHowever, characters will not be able to equip more than 1 Special Equipment Item#

5570000.name: Vicious' Hammer
5570000.desc: Temper the equipped item with Vicious' Hammer to increase available upgrade by 1. It can be used maximum 2 times per item. Warning: You cannot use it on the Horntail Necklace.

5590000.name: High-Five Stamp
5590000.desc: Can equip items that are 5 levels above your current level.

5610000.name: Vega's Spell(10%)
5610000.desc: This winning spell from Vega enables a 30% success rate on a 10% scroll. Please check the scroll description to confirm that Vega's Spell is available for the scroll you choose.

5610001.name: Vega's Spell(60%)
5610001.desc: This winning spell from Vega enables a 90% success rate on a 60% scroll. Please check the scroll description to confirm that Vega's Spell is available for the scroll you choose.
